name: Aragorn
description: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest. spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Theodred
description: Response: After ThEodred commits to a quest. choose a hero committed to that quest.  Add 1 resource to that heros resource pool.

name: Gloin
description: Response: After Gloin suffers damage. add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

name: Gimli
description: Gimli gets +1 Attack for each damage token on him.

name: Legolas
description: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy. place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

name: Thalin
description: While Thalin is committed to a quest. deal 1 damage to each enemy as it is revealed by the encounter deck.

name: Eowyn
description: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Eowyn +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.

name: Eleanor
description: Response: Exhaust Eleanor to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a treachery card just revealed by the encounter deck. Then. discard that card. and replace it with the next card from the encounter deck.

name: Dunhere
description: Dunhere can target enemies in the staging area when he attacks alone. When doing so. he gets +1 Attack.

name: Denethor
description: Action: Exhaust Denethor to look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may move that card to the bottom of the deck.

name: Glorfindel (CORE)
description: Action: Pay 1 resource from Glorfindels pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

name: Beravor
description: Action: Exhaust Beravor to choose a player. That player draws 2 cards.

name: Faramir
description: Action: Exhaust Faramir to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 Willpower until end of the phase.

name: Son of Arnor
description: Response: After Son of Arnor enters play. choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.

name: Snowbourn Scout
description: Response: After Snowbourn Scout enters play. choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.

name: Longbeard Orc Slayer
description: Response: After Longbeard Orc Slayer enters play. deal 1 damage to each Orc enemy in play.

name: Brok Ironfist
description: Response: After a Dwarf hero you control leaves play. put Brok Ironfist into play from your hand.

name: Ever Vigilant
description: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

name: Common Cause
description: Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.

name: For Gondor!
description: Action: Until the end of the phase. all characters get +1 Attack. All Gondor characters also get +1 Defense until the end of the phase.

name: Sneak Attack
description: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase. if that ally is still in play. return it to your hand.

name: Valiant Sacrifice
description: Response: After an ally card leaves play. that cards controller draws 2 cards.

name: Grim Resolve
description: Action: Ready all character cards in play.

name: Steward of Gondor
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Gondor trait. Action: Exhaust Steward of Gondor to add 2 resources to attached heros resource pool.

name: Celebríans Stone
description: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gains +2 Willpower. If attached hero is Aragorn. he also gains a Spirit resource icon.

name: Gondorian Spearman
description: Response: After Gondorian Spearman is declared as a defender. deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Beorn
description: Action: Beorn gains +5 Attack until the end of the phase. At the end of that phase in which you trigger this effect. shuffle Beorn back into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

name: Blade Mastery
description: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase. that character gains +1 Attack and +1 Defense.

name: Rain of Arrows
description: Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

name: Feint
description: Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack this phase.

name: Quick Strike
description: Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve this attack) against any eligible enemy target.

name: Thicket of Spears
description: You must use resources from 3 different heroes pools to pay for this card. Action: Choose a player. That players engaged enemies do not attack this phase.

name: Swift Strike
description: Response: After a character is declared as a defender. deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Stand Together
description: Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.

name: Blade of Gondolin
description: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gets +1 Attack when attacking an Orc. Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy. place 1 progress token on the current quest.

name: Citadel Plate
description: Attach to hero. Restricted. Attached hero gets +4 Hit Points.

name: Dwarven Axe
description: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gains +1 Attack. (+2 Attack instead if attached hero is a Dwarf.)

name: Horn of Gondor
description: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Response: After a character leaves play. add 1 resource to attached heros pool.

name: Wandering Took
description: Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Wandering Took to another player. Raise that players threat by 3.

name: Lorien Guide
description: Response: After Lorien Guide commits to a quest. place 1 progress token on the active location.

name: Northern Tracker
description: Response: After Northern Tracker commits to a quest. place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.

name: The Galadhrims Greeting
description: Action: Reduce one players threat by 6. or reduce each players threat by 2.

name: Strength of Will
description: Response: After you travel to a location. exhaust a Spirit character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.

name: Hasty Stroke
description: Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.

name: Will of the West
description: Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that players discard pile back into his deck.

name: A Test of Will
description: Response: Cancel the "when revealed" effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

name: Stand and Fight
description: Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any players discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control. (The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.)

name: A Light in the Dark
description: Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.

name: Dwarven Tomb
description: Action: Return 1 Spirit card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Fortune or Fate
description: Action: Choose a hero in any players discard pile. Put that card into play. under its owners control.

name: The Favor of the Lady
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Willpower.

name: Power in the Earth
description: Attach to a location. Attached location gets -1 Threat.

name: Unexpected Courage
description: Attach to a hero. Action: Exhaust Unexpected Courage to ready attached hero.

name: Daughter of the Nimrodel
description: Action: Exhaust Daughter of the Nimrodel to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.

name: Erebor Hammersmith
description: Response: After you play Erebor Hammersmith. return the topmost attachment in any players discard pile to his hand.

name: Henemarth Riversong
description: Action: Exhaust Henemarth Riversong to look at the top card of the encounter deck.

name: Miner of the Iron Hills
description: Response: After Miner of the Iron Hills enters play. choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.

name: GlEowine
description: Action: Exhaust GlEowine to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

name: Lore of Imladris
description: Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.

name: Loriens Wealth
description: Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.

name: Radagasts Cunning
description: Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase. that enemy does not contribute its Threat.

name: Secret Paths
description: Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase. that location does not contribute its Threat.

name: Gandalfs Search
description: Action: Look at the top X cards of any players deck. add 1 of those cards to its owners hand. and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

name: Beorns Hospitality
description: Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

name: Forest Snare
description: Attach to an enemy engaged with a player. Attached enemy cannot attack.

name: Protector of Lorien
description: Attach to a hero. Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 Defense or +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Dark Knowledge
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 Willpower. Response: Exhaust Dark Knowledge to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

name: Self Preservation
description: Attach to a character.  Action: Exhaust Self Preservation to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.

name: Gandalf (Core)
description: At the end of the round. discard Gandalf from play.  Response: After Gandalf enters play. (choose 1): draw 3 cards. deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play. or reduce your threat by 5.

name: King Spider
description: When Revealed: Each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.

name: Hummerhorns
description: Forced: After Hummerhorns engages you. deal 5 damage to a single hero you control.

name: Ungoliants Spawn
description: When Revealed: Each character currently committed to a quest gets -1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Great Forest Web
description: Travel: Each player must exhaust 1 hero he controls to travel here.

name: Mountains of Mirkwood
description: Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.  Response: After Mountains of Mirkwood leaves play as an explored location. each player may search the top 5 cards of his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Shuffle the rest of the searched cards back into their owners decks.

name: Eyes of the Forest
description: When Revealed: Each player discards all event cards in his hand.

name: Caught in the Web
description: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat level attaches this card to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero does not ready during the refresh phase unless you pay 2 resources from that heros pool.")

name: Hill Troll
description: Excess combat damage dealt by Hill Troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) must be assigned as an increase to your threat.

name: Goblin Sniper
description: During the encounter phase. players cannot optionally engage Goblin Sniper if there are other enemies in the staging area. Forced: If Goblin Sniper is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase. each player deals 1 point of damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Marsh Adder
description: Forced: Each time Marsh Adder attacks you. raise your threat by 1.

name: Wargs
description: Forced: If Wargs is dealt a shadow card with no effect. return Wargs to the staging area after it attacks.

name: Despair
description: When Revealed: Remove 4 progress tokens from the current quest card. (If there are fewer than 4 progress tokens on the quest. remove all progress tokens from that quest.)

name: The Brown Lands
description: Forced: After the players travel to The Brown Lands. place 1 progress token on it.

name: The East Bight
description: When faced with the option to travel. the players must travel to The East Bight if there is no active location.

name: Dol Guldur Orcs
description: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 character currently committed to a quest. Deal 2 damage to that character.

name: Chieftan Ufthak
description: Chieftan Ufthak gets +2 Attack for each resource token on him. Forced: After Chieftan Ufthak attacks. place 1 resource token on him.

name: Dol Guldur Beastmaster
description: Forced: After Dol Guldur Beastmaster attacks. deal it 1 additional shadow card.

name: Driven by Shadow
description: When Revealed: Each enemy and each location currently in the staging area gets +1 Threat until the end of the phase. If there are no cards in the staging area. Driven by Shadow gains surge.

name: The Necromancers Reach
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

name: Necromancers Pass
description: Travel: The first player must discard 2 cards from his hand at random to travel here.

name: Enchanted Stream
description: While Enchanted Stream is the active location. players cannot draw cards.

name: Forest Spider
description: Forced: After Forest Spider engages a player. it gets +1 Attack until the end of the round.

name: Black Forest Bats
description: When Revealed: Each player must choose 1 character currently committed to a quest. and remove that character from the quest. (The chosen character does not ready.)

name: Old Forest Road
description: Response: After you travel to Old Forest Road. the first player may choose and ready 1 character he controls.

name: Forest Gate
description: Response: After you travel to Forest Gate. the first player may draw 2 cards.

name: Dungeon Jailor
description: Forced: If Dungeon Jailor is in the staging area after the players have just quested unsuccessfully. shuffle 1 unclaimed objective card from the staging area back into the encounter deck.

name: Nazgul of Dol Guldur
description: Forced: When the prisoner is "rescued." move Nazgul of Dol Guldur into the staging area.  Forced: After a shadow effect dealt to Nazgul of Dol Guldur resolves. the engaged player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

name: Under the Shadow
description: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase. raise the total Threat in the staging area by X. where X is the number of players in the game.

name: Iron Shackles
description: When Revealed: Attach Iron Shackles to the top of the first players deck. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "The next time a player would draw 1 or more cards from attached deck. discard Iron Shackles instead.")

name: Tower Gate
description: After travelling to Tower Gate. each player places the top card of his deck. face down in front of him. as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard". and act as enemies with: 1 hit point. 1 [Attack]. and 1 [Defense].

name: Gandalfs Map
description: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed. attach Gandalfs Map to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached. return Gandalfs Map to the staging area.) Attached hero cannot attack or defend.

name: Dungeon Torch
description: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed. attach Dungeon Torch to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached. return Dungeon Torch to the staging area.)  Forced: At the end of each round. raise attached heros controllers threat by 2.

name: Shadow Key
description: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed. attach Shadow Key to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached. return Shadow Key to the staging area.) Forced: At the end of each round. attached hero suffers 1 damage.

name: Misty Mountain Goblins
description: Forced: After Misty Mountain Goblins attacks. remove 1 progress token from the current quest.

name: Massing at Night
description: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Banks of the Anduin
description: Forced: If Banks of the Anduin leaves play. return it to the top of the encounter deck instead of placing it in the discard pile.

name: Gladden Fields
description: Forced: While Gladden Fields is the active location. each player must raise his threat by an additional point during the refresh phase.

name: Eastern Crows
description: Forced: After Eastern Crows is defeated. shuffle it back into the encounter deck.

name: Evil Storm
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character controlled by each player with a threat of 35 or higher.

name: Pursued by Shadow
description: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each character he controls that is not currently committed to a quest.

name: Treacherous Fog
description: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 Threat until the end of the phase. Then. each player with a threat of 35 or higher chooses and discards 1 card from his hand.

name: Flies and Spiders
description: Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of the Forest Spider and 1 copy of the Old Forest Road. and add them to the staging area. Then. shuffle the encounter deck. Side B: none.

name: A Fork in the Road
description: Side A: none. Side B: Forced: When you defeat this stage. proceed to one of the 2 "A Chosen Path" stages. at random.

name: A Chosen Path - "Dont Leave the Path!"
description: Side A: none.  Side B: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Spider card of his choice. and add it to the staging area. The players must find and defeat Ungoliants Spawn to win this game.

name: A Chosen Path - Beorns Path
description: Side A: none. Side B: Players cannot defeat this stage when Ungoliants Spawn is in play. If players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: The Necromancers Tower
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for the 3 objective cards. and place them in the staging area. Also. place the Nazgul of Dol Guldur face up but out of play. alongside the quest deck. Then. shuffle the encounter deck and attach 1 encounter to each objective card. Side B: When Revealed: Randomly select 1 hero card (among all the heroes controlled by the players) and turn it facedown. That hero is now considered a "prisoner." cannot be used. cannot be damaged. and does not collect resources. until it is "rescued" (as instructed by card effects) later in this quest. 
The players. as a group. cannot play more than 1 ally card each round. 
Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have at least 1 objective card.

name: Through the Caverns
description:
Side A: none. Side B: Response: After placing any number of progress tokens on this card. flip the "prisoner" hero card face up. and place 1 damage token on it. This hero has now been "rescued." and may now be used by its controller. 
The players. as a group. cannot play more than 1 ally card each round. 
Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have rescued the prisoner and have all 3 "Escape from Dol Guldur" objective cards.

name: Out of the Dungeons
description:
Side A: none. Side B: Forced: At the beginning of each quest phase. each player places the top card of his deck. face down in front of him. as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard." and act as enemies with: 1 hit point. 1 Attack. and 1 Defense. 
Players cannot defeat this stage while Nazgul of Dol Guldur is in play. If it is defeated and Nazgul of Dol Guldur is not in play. the players have won the game.

name: To the River…
description:
Side A: Setup: Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck. and adds it to the staging area. Side B: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 Hill Troll (if one is not already in play). and place it in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Players cannot defeat this stage while any Hill Troll cards are in play.

name: Anduin Passage
description: Side A: none. Side B: Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck each quest phase. Do not make engagement checks during the encounter phase. (Each player may still optionally engage 1 enemy each encounter phase.)

name: Ambush on the Shore
description:
Side A: none.  Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 2 encounter cards per player and add them to the staging area.
Skip the staging step of the quest phase for the remainder of the game.
Once there are no enemies in play. the players have won the game.

name: Bilbo Baggins (HfG)
description: The first player draws 1 additional card in the resource phase.

name: Dunedain Mark
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Attack. Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Mark to another hero.

name: Campfire Tales
description: Action: Each player draws 1 card.

name: Winged Guardian
description: Winged Guardian cannot have restricted attachments. Forced: After an attack in which Winged Guardian defends resolves. pay 1 Tactics resource or discard Winged Guardian from play.

name: The Eagles are Coming!
description: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Eagle cards and add them to your hand.  Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Westfold Horse-Breaker
description: Action: Discard Westfold Horse-Breaker to choose and ready a hero.

name: Mustering the Rohirrim
description: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any 1 Rohan ally card and add it to your hand.  Then. shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Rivendell Minstrel
description: Response: After you play Rivendell Minstrel from your hand. search your deck for 1 Song card and add it to your hand.  Shuffle your deck.

name: Striders Path
description: Response: After a location is revealed from the encounter deck. immediately travel to that location without resolving its Travel effect.  If another location is currently active. return it to the staging area.

name: Song of Kings
description: Attach to a hero.Attached hero gains a Leadership resource icon.

name: The Hunt Begins
description:
Side A: Setup: Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck. and add it to the staging area.
Side B: Forced: After the players quest successfully. the first player looks at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck.  Reveal and add 1 of those cards to the staging area. and discard the other 2 cards.

name: A New Terror Abroad
description: Side A: none.  Side B: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase. the first player looks at the top 2 cards of the encounter deck.  Reveal and add 1 of those cards to the staging area. and discard the other.

name: On the Trail
description:
Side A: none.  Side B: Any player who does not control a hero with at least 1 Clue objective attached cannot commit characters to this quest.  If there are ever no heroes with Clue objectives attached in play. reset the quest deck to stage 2B.
If the players defeat this stage. the players have once again found a true sign of Gollums passing. and won the game.

name: Signs of Gollum
description: Guarded. Response: After the players quest successfully. the players may claim Signs of Gollum if it has no attached encounters. When claimed. attach Signs of Gollum to any hero committed to the quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with: "Forced: After attached hero is damaged or leaves play. return this card to the top of the encounter deck.")

name: The Old Ford
description: X is the number of ally cards in play.

name: The Eaves of Mirkwood
description: While The Eaves of Mirkwood is the active location. encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

name: River Ninglor
description: While River Ninglor is the active location. remove 1 progress token from it and from the current quest at the end of each round.

name: The East Bank
description: While The East Bank is the active location. ally cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.

name: The West Bank
description: While The West Bank is the active location. attachment and event cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.

name: Goblintown Scavengers
description: When Revealed: Discard the top card of each players deck. Until the end of the phase. increase Goblintown Scavengers Threat by the total printed cost of all cards discarded in this way.

name: Hunters from Mordor
description: Hunters from Mordor get +2 Attack and +2 Threat for each Clue card in play.

name: False Lead
description: When Revealed: The first player chooses and shuffles a card with the printed Clue trait back into the encounter deck. If there are no Clue cards in play. False Lead gains surge.

name: Flooding
description: When Revealed: Remove all progress tokens from all Riverland locations.

name: Old Wives Tales
description: When Revealed: Discard 1 resource from each heros resource pool. if able. Exhaust any hero that could not discard a resource from its pool.

name: Frodo Baggins
description: Response: After Frodo Baggins is damaged. cancel the damage and instead raise your threat by the amount of damage he would have been dealt. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Dunedain Warning
description:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Defense.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Warning to another hero.

name: Second Breakfast
description: Action: Each player returns the topmost attachment card from his discard pile to his hand.

name: Beorning Beekeeper
description: Action: Discard Beorning Beekeeper from play to deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area.

name: Born Aloft
description: Attach to an ally.  Action: Discard Born Aloft from play to return attached ally to its owners hand.

name: Eomund
description: Response: After Eomund leaves play. ready all Rohan characters in play.

name: Nor am I a Stranger
description: Attach to a character. Attached character gains the Rohan trait.

name: Longbeard Map-Maker
description: Action: Spend 1 Lore Resource to give Longbeard Map-Maker +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: A Burning Brand
description: Attach to Lore character.  While attached character is defending. cancel any shadow effects on cards dealt to the attacking enemy.

name: Song of Wisdom
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Lore resource icon.

name: Grimbeorns Quest
description: Side A: Setup: Add The Carrock to the staging area.  Remove 4 unique Troll cards and 4 copies of the "Sacked!" card from the encounter deck and set them aside. out of play.  Then shuffle 1 "Sacked!" card per player back into the encounter deck.  Side B: Forced: After placing the 7th progress token on Grimbeorns Quest. The Carrock becomes the active location.  Discard the previous active location from play.

name: Against the Trolls
description:
Side A: none.  Side B: When Revealed: Place the unique Troll cards previously set aside into the staging area.
Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any Troll enemies in play.

name: Grimbeorn the Old
description:
Grimbeorn the Old does not exhaust to defend against Troll enemies. If Grimbeorn the Old has 8 or more resource tokens on him. he joins the first player as an ally.
Action: Spend 1 Leadership resource to place that resource on Grimbeorn the Old.

name: Louis
description: While Louis is engaged with a player. all Troll enemies gain. "Forced: After this enemy attacks. the defending player must raise his threat by 3."Response: After defeating Louis. you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Morris
description: While Morris is engaged with a player. all Troll enemies get +1 Attack. Response: After defeating Morris. you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Stuart
description: While Stuart is engaged with a player. all Troll enemies get +1 Defense. Response: After defeating Stuart. you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Rupert
description: Forced: After Rupert attacks. shuffle all copies of the "Sacked!" card from the discard pile back into the encounter deck. Response: After defeating Rupert. you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Muck Adder
description: Forced: If Muck Adder damages a character. discard that character from play.

name: The Carrock
description: Immune to player card effects. Players cannot travel to The Carrock except through quest card effects. While The Carrock is the active location. Troll enemies get +1 [Attack] and +1 [Defense].

name: River Langflood
description: While it is in the staging area. River Langflood gets +1 [Threat] for each Troll enemy in play.

name: Bee Pastures
description: Response: After you travel to Bee Pastures. search the encounter deck and discard pile for Grimbeorn the Old and add him to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Oak-Wood Grove
description: While Oak-wood Grove is the active location. resource tokens from any sphere may be spent as Leadership resource tokens.

name: A Frightened Beast
description: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by the total Threat of all cards in the staging area. Any player may choose to discard from play 1 Creature ally card he controls to cancel this effect.

name: Sacked!
description: When Revealed: Attach to a hero with no "Sacked!" cards attached controlled by the first player. (Cannot be canceled). Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero cannot attack. defend. commit to a quest. trigger its effect. or collect resources."

name: Roasted Slowly
description: When Revealed: Destroy all heroes with the card "Sacked!" attached. Then. shuffle Roasted Slowly back into the encounter deck.

name: Prince Imrahil
description: Response: After a character leaves play. ready Prince Imrahil. (Limit once per round.)

name: Dunedain Quest
description:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 Willpower.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Quest to another hero.

name: Parting Gifts
description: Action: Move any number of resource tokens from a Leadership heros resource pool to any other heros resource pool.

name: Landroval
description:
Landroval cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After a hero card is destroyed. return Landroval to his owners hand to put that hero back into play. with 1 damage token on it. (Limit once per game.)

name: To the Eyrie
description: Response: After an ally is destroyed. exhaust 1 Eagle character to move that ally from the discard pile to its owners hand.

name: Escort from Edoras
description:
While committed to a quest. Escort from Edoras gets +2 Willpower.
Forced: After resolving a quest to which Escort from Edoras was committed. discard Escort from Edoras from play.

name: Ancient Mathom
description:
Attach to a location.
Response: After attached location is explored. the first player draws 3 cards.

name: Infighting
description: Action: Move any number of damage from one enemy to another.

name: Radagast
description:
Radagast collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Creature cards played from your hand. 
Action: Spend X resources from Radagasts pool to heal X wounds on any 1 Creature.

name: The Wounded Eagle
description: Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Rhosgobel and Wilyador. and add them to the staging area with 2 damage tokens on Wilyador.  Then. shuffle the encounter deck.  Side B: none.

name: Radagasts Request
description:
Side A: none. Side B: Response: After the quest phase begins. the first player may place X damage tokens on Wilyador to look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck.  Reveal and add 1 of these cards to the staging area. and discard the other 2.  X is the number of players in the game.
Forced: After a card effect heals Wilyador. remove that card from the game.

name: Return to Rhosgobel
description:
Side A: none.  Side B: When Revealed: Heal 5 wounds from Wilyador for each Athelas objective card the players control.
If Wilyador is completely healed when this effect resolves. Wilyador survives and the players have won the game.  Otherwise. the players have lost the game.

name: Athelas
description: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then. attach Athelas to that hero.

name: Wilyador
description:
No attachments. The first player gains control of Wilyador. as an ally.
Forced: At the end of each round. Wilyador suffers 2 damage.Wilyador cannot be healed of more than 5 wounds by a single effect. If Wilyador leaves play. the players have lost the game.

name: Rhosgobel
description:
While Rhosgobel is in the staging area. Wilyador cannot be healed.
Travel: Players must complete stage one of this quest before they can travel to Rhosgobel.

name: Forest Grove
description: Response: After the players explore Forest Grove. search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Athelas objective. and add it to the staging area. Then. shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Exhaustion
description: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each exhausted character.

name: Swarming Insects
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character without any attachments.

name: Festering Wounds
description: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each wounded character.

name: Mirkwood Flock
description: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Mirkwood Flock.

name: Black Forest Bats
description: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Black Forest Bats.

name: Brand son of Bain
description: Response: After Brand son of Bain attacks and defeats an enemy engaged with another player. choose and ready one of that players characters.

name: Keen-eyed Took
description:
Response: After Keen-eyed Took enters play. reveal the top card of each players deck.
Action: Return Keen-eyed Took to your hand to discard the top card of each players deck.

name: Rear Guard
description: Quest Action: Discard a Leadership ally to give each hero committed to this quest +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Descendant of Thorondor
description:
Descendant of Thorondor cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After Descendant of Thorondor enters or leaves play. deal 2 damage to any 1 enemy in the staging area.

name: Meneldors Flight
description: Action: Choose an Eagle ally.  Return that character to its owners hand.

name: The Riddermarks Finest
description: Action: Exhaust and discard The Riddermarks Finest to place 2 progress tokens on any location.

name: Ride to Ruin
description: Action: Discard a Rohan ally to choose a location. Place 3 progress tokens on that location.

name: Gildor Inglorion
description: Action: Exhaust Gildor Inglorion to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card from your hand. Then. return the 3 cards to the top of your deck. in any order.

name: Gildors Counsel
description:
Play during the Quest phase. before characters are committed to the Quest.
Action: Reveal 1 less card from the encounter deck this phase. (To a minimum of 1.)

name: Song of Travel
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Spirit resource icon.

name: The Hills of Emyn Muil
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Amon Hen and Amon Lhaw. and add them to the staging area.  Then shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: Forced: If there are no location cards in the staging area. the first treachery card revealed during the quest phase gains surge.
Players cannot defeat this stage unless there are no Emyn Muil locations in play. and the have collected at least 20 victory points.

name: Amon Hen
description: X is double the number of players in the game. While Amon Hen is the active location. players cannot play events.

name: Amon Lhaw
description: X is double the number of players in the game. While Amon Lhaw is the active location. treat all attachments as if their printed text boxes were blank.

name: The East Wall of Rohan
description: While The East Wall of Rohan is the active location. non-Rohan characters cost 2 additional matching resources to play.

name: The North Stair
description: Forced: After traveling to the North Stair. move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the staging area. Resolve any "when revealed" effects on that card.

name: Rauros Falls
description: While Rauros Falls is the active location. all characters must commit to the current quest during the quest phase.

name: The Shores of Nen Hithoel
description: Travel: The first player must discard 1 event card from his hand to travel to this location.

name: The Outer Ridge
description: While The Outer Ridge is the active location. each location in the staging area gets +1 Threat.

name: The Highlands
description: Travel: In order to travel to The Highlands. the players must reveal the top card of the encounter deck. and add it to the staging area.

name: Impassable Chasm
description: When Revealed: If there is an active location. remove all progress tokens from that location and return it to the staging area. If no location is moved by this effect. this card gains surge.

name: Rockslide
description: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each character committed to this quest.

name: Slick Footing
description: When Revealed: Remove 1 progress token from each location in play. Then. discard the top card of each players deck for each progress token removed by this effect.

name: Orc Horse Thieves
description: Orc Horse Thieves get +1 Attack for each location in the staging area.

name: Boromir
description:
Action: Raise your threat by 1 to ready Boromir.
Action: Discard Boromir to deal 2 damage to each enemy engaged with a single player.

name: Dunedain Watcher
description: Response: Discard Dunedain Watcher from play to cancel the shadow effects of a card just triggered.

name: Dunedain Cache
description:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains ranged.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedain Cache to another hero.

name: Vassal of the Windlord
description:
Vassal of the Windlord cannot have restricted attachments.
Forced: After an attack in which Vassal of the Windlord attacked resolves. discard Vassal of the Windlord from play.

name: Song of Mocking
description:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust Song of Mocking to choose another hero.  Until the end of the phase. attached hero takes all damage assigned to the chosen hero.

name: Elfhelm
description: While Elfhelm is ready. he gains:"Response: After your threat is raised as the result of questing unsuccessfully. or by an encounter or quest card effect. reduce your threat by 1."

name: We Do Not Sleep
description: Action: Until the end of the phase. Rohan characters do not exhaust to commit to quests.

name: Silvan Tracker
description: Response: After a Silvan character readies during the refresh phase. heal 1 damage from that character.

name: Fast Hitch
description:
Attach to a Hobbit character.
Action: Exhaust Fast Hitch to ready attached character.

name: Song of Battle
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Tactics resource icon.

name: Into the Marshes
description: Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum. and add it to the staging area.  Shuffle the encounter deck. then reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.  Side B: none.

name: The Capture
description:
Side A: none.  Side B: Forced: After this stage is defeated. the first player chooses a player.  That player must pass an Escape test. dealing 1 card from the encounter deck for each resource token on Gollum. to capture him.  If Gollum is not captured at this time. reset the quest deck to stage 1B.
If this final Escape test is passed. the players have captured Gollum and won the game.

name: Gollum
description: If Gollum ever has 8 or more resource tokens on him. shuffle him back into the encounter deck. Forced: At the end of the quest phase. the party must make an escape test. dealing 1 card per player from the encounter deck. If this test is failed. place 2 resource tokens on Gollum.

name: A Wisp of Pale Sheen
description: When Revealed: Place 2 resource tokens on Gollum. Any player may exhaust a Lore hero to reduce this effect to 1 resource token.

name: Nightfall
description: When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test. dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed. place 1 resource token on Gollum and raise each players threat by 2. Escape: 2

name: Through the Mist
description: When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test counting Attack instead of Willpower. dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed. place 1 resource token on Gollum and raise each players threat by 1. Escape: 3

name: The Lights of the Dead
description: When Revealed: Each player must make an escape test. dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck for each test. Each player that fails this test places 1 resource token on Gollum. and raises his threat by 1. Escape: 5

name: Giant Marsh Worm
description: Forced: Remove 2 damage from Giant Marsh Worm at the end of each round. Escape: 2

name: Impassable Bog
description: When Revealed: Place 1 resource token on Gollum for each location card in the staging area. Escape 2.

name: The Heart of the Marshes
description: While The Heart of the Marshes is the active location. all cards dealt from the encounter deck for escape tests get +1 Escape. (Cards receive this bonus even if they do not have a printed escape value.) Escape: 1

name: Fens and Mires
description: Forced: After the players travel to this location. place 1 resource token on Gollum. Escape: 2

name: Dain Ironfoot
description: While Dain Ironfoot is ready. Dwarf characters get +1 Attack and +1 Willpower.

name: Dunedain Signal
description:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains sentinel.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached heros pool to attach Dunedains Signal to another hero.

name: Dawn Take You All
description:
Play after shadow cards have been dealt. before any attacks have resolved.
Combat Action: Each player may choose and discard 1 facedown shadow card from an enemy with which he is engaged.

name: Eagles of the Misty Mountains
description:
Eagles of the Misty Mountains cannot have restricted attachments.  Eagles of the Misty Mountains gets +1 Attack and +1 Defense for each facedown attachment it has.
Response: After another Eagle character leaves play. you may attach that card facedown to Eagles of the Misty Mountains.

name: Support of the Eagles
description:
Attach to a Tactics hero.
Action: Exhaust Support of the Eagles to choose an Eagle ally.  Until the end of the phase. attached hero adds that allys Attack or Defense (choose 1) to its own.

name: West Road Traveller
description: Response: After you play West Road Traveller from your hand. switch the active location with any other location in the staging area.

name: Astonishing Speed
description: Action: Until the end of the phase. all Rohan characters get +2 Willpower.

name: Mirkwood Runner
description: While Mirkwood Runner is attacking alone. the defending enemy does not count its Defense.

name: Rumour from the Earth
description: Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck.  Then. you may pay 1 Lore resource to return Rumour from the Earth to your hand.

name: Shadow of the Past
description: Action: Move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck.

name: Through the Forest
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum.  Choose a player to guard Gollum at the start of the game. and place Gollum in front of that player.  Then shuffle the encounter deck.  Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck. and add it to the staging area.
Side B: none.

name: Escape Attempt
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: The player guarding Gollum cannot commit characters to this quest (unless he is the only player remaining in the game).
If the players quest unsuccessfully. Gollum escapes and the players have lost the game.

name: To the Elvin Kings Halls
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: The player guarding Gollum cannot play cards from his hand.

name: Ambush
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: Forced: At the beginning of the combat phase. all enemies in play engage the player guarding Gollum.
Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any enemies in play.  If players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Gollum
description:
Damage from undefended attacks against you must be dealt to Gollum. If Gollum is destroyed. or if the player guarding Gollum is eliminated. the players have lost the game.
Forced: At the end of each round. raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 3. Then. than player may choose a new player to guard Gollum.

name: The Spiders Ring
description: While The Spiders Ring is the active location. the player guarding Gollum cannot change.

name: Dry Watercourse
description: While Dry Watercourse is the active location. all treachery card effects that target the player guarding Gollum also target each other player.

name: Woodmans Glade
description:
Travel: The player guarding Gollum must exhaust a hero he controls to travel to Woodmans Glade.
Response: After exploring Woodmans Glade. reduce the threat of each player not guarding Gollum by 2.

name: Wood Elf Path
description: Response: After the players travel to Wood Elf Path. the player guarding Gollum may choose a new player to guard him.

name: Gollums Anguish
description: When Revealed: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 8. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum. if able.

name: Gollums Bite
description: When Revealed: Deal 4 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum. if able.

name: Wasted Provisions
description: When Revealed: Discard the top 10 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum. if able.

name: Mirkwood Bats
description: Forced: After Mirkwood Bats engages a player. deal 1 damage to each character controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

name: Attercop. Attercop
description: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase. Attercop. Attercop automatically engages the player guarding Gollum. regardless of his threat.

name: Dwalin
description: Response: After Dwalin attacks and destroys an Orc enemy. lower your threat by 2.

name: Bifur
description: Action: Pay 1 resource from a heros resource pool to add 1 resource to Bifurs resource pool. Any player may trigger this ability. (Limit once per round.)

name: Narvis Belt
description: Attach to a Dwarf hero. Action: Exhaust Narvis Belt to give attached hero a resource icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Durins Song
description: Action: Choose a Dwarf hero.  That hero gets +2 Willpower. +2 Attack. and +2 Defense until the end of the round.

name: Ever Onward
description: Response: After players quest unsuccessfully. choose a player.  That player does not raise his threat.

name: Veteran of Nanduhirion
description: Veteran of Nanduhirion enters play with 1 damage on it.

name: Dwarrowdelf Axe
description:
Attach to a Dwarf character.  Restricted. Attached character gets +1 Attack. 
Response: After attached character attacks. deal 1 damage to the defending enemy.

name: Khazâd! Khazâd!
description: Action: Choose a Dwarf character.  Until the end of the phase. that character gets +3 Attack.

name: Zigil Miner
description: Action: Exhaust Zigil Miner and name a number to discard the top 2 cards of your deck.  If at least one of those cards has a cost equal to the named number. choose a hero you control.  That hero adds resources to his resource pool equal to the named number.

name: Untroubled by Darkness
description: Action: Each Dwarf character gets +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. (+2 Willpower instead if the active location is an Underground or Dark location.)

name: Erebor Record Keeper
description:
Erebor Record Keeper cannot attack or defend.
Action: Exhaust Erebor Record Keeper and pay 1 Lore resource to choose and ready a Dwarf character.

name: Ancestral Knowledge
description: Action: Exhaust a Dwarf character to place 2 progress tokens on the active location.  (4 progress tokens instead if it is an Underground or Mountain location.)

name: Boots from Erebor
description: Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character. Limit 1 Boots from Erebor per character. Attached character gets +1 hit point.

name: Patrol Leader
description: Forced: Before Patrol Leader is dealt damage. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is an enemy. cancel that damage.

name: East-gate
description:
Immune to card effects. Players cannot optionally engage enemies and no engagement checks are made.
Forced: After East-gate leaves play as an explored location. add First Hall to the staging area.

name: First Hall
description:
Travel: Each player must raise his threat by 3 to travel here.
Forced: After First Hall leaves play as an explored location. add Bridge of Khazad-dum to the staging area.

name: Bridge of Khazad-dum
description: While Bridge of Khazad-dum is the active location. players cannot play cards.

name: Stairs of Nain
description: Travel: The first player must exhaust 1 character he controls to travel here.

name: Cave-troll
description: For each excess point of combat damage dealt by Cave-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) you must damage another character you control.

name: Orc Horn Blower
description: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

name: Hidden Threat
description: When Revealed: Each player must raise his threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area. Then. the last player discards an attachment he controls.

name: Book of Mazarbul
description: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then. attach Book of Marzarbul to that hero. (If detached. return Book of Mazarbul to the staging area.) Attached hero cannot attack and does not exhaust to commit to a quest.

name: The Nameless Fear
description: Immune to player card effects. The Nameless Fear cannot engage or be engaged. X is the number of victory points in the victory point display.

name: New Devilry
description: When Revealed: If the players are not on stage 1. shuffle the current quest card into the quest deck. then reveal a new quest card. Otherwise. New Devilry gains surge.

name: Shadow of Fear
description:
When Revealed: The first player attaches Shadow of Fear to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot exhaust or ready and its text box is treated as if it were blank. 
Action: Pay 3 resources from attached heros pool to discard this card.")

name: A Foe Beyond
description: When Revealed: The last player deals damage equal to The Nameless Fears Attack to a hero he controls. This effect cannot be canceled.Shadow: Deal damage equal to The Nameless Fears Attack to the defending character.

name: Abandoned Tools
description:
Guarded. Restricted. 
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then. attach Abandoned Tools to that hero. (If detached. return Abandoned Tools to the staging area.)

name: Chieftain of the Pit
description: When Revealed: Chieftain of the Pit gets +3 Attack until the end of the round.

name: Goblin Spearman
description: Goblin Spearman gets +2 Attack if its attack is undefended.

name: Goblin Archer
description:
Players cannot optionally engage Goblin Archer.
Characters with ranged are eligible to attack Goblin Archer while it is in the staging area.
Forced: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck. the first player must deal 1 damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Undisturbed Bones
description: When Revealed: Each player must deal X damage to 1 ally he controls. X is the number of allies he controls.

name: Plundered Armoury
description:
While Plundered Armoury is in the staging area. enemies get +1 Attack.
Response: After Plundered Armoury leaves play as an explored location. each player may attach a Weapon or Armour attachment from his hand to 1 character he controls.

name: Goblin Follower
description: When Revealed: Goblin Follower engages the last player.

name: Branching Paths
description:
While Branching Paths is in the staging area. each Dark location gets +1 Threat. 
Forced: After Branching Paths leaves play as an explored location. look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Players must choose 1 of those to reveal and add to the staging area. moving the other 2 to the bottom of the deck.

name: Lightless Passage
description: Travel: Players must exhaust a Cave Torch to travel here.

name: Zigil Mineshaft
description: Action: Raise each players threat by 1 to place 1 progress token on Zigil Mineshaft.

name: Many Roads
description: When Revealed: Shuffle all locations in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

name: Burning Low
description: When Revealed: Each enemy and location currently in the staging area gets +1 Threat until the end of the phase. (+3 Threat instead if it is a Dark location.) Players may exhaust a Cave Torch to cancel this effect.

name: Cave Torch
description:
Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Action: Exhaust Cave Torch to place up to 3 progress tokens on a Dark location. Forced: After Cave Torch exhausts. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy. add it to the staging area.

name: Great Cave-troll
description: Immune to ranged damage. No attachments can be played on Great Cave-troll.

name: Orc Drummer
description: While Orc Drummer is in the staging area. each enemy gets +X Threat. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Stray Goblin
description: X is the number of players in the game.

name: Chance Encounter
description: When Revealed: Put the top enemy in the encounter discard pile into play. engaged with the first player. If this effect put no enemies into play. Chance Encounter gains surge.

name: Massing in the Deep
description: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area. X is the number of players in the game.

name: The Mountains Roots
description: X is the number of players in the game.

name: Cave In
description: When Revealed: Remove all progress tokens from the current quest card and active location. If Cave In removed no progress tokens. it gains surge.

name: Crumbling Ruin
description: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust a character and discard the top card of his deck. if able. If the printed cost of the discarded card is equal to or higher than the remaining hit points of the exhausted character. discard the exhausted character.

name: Dark and Dreadful
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. (2 damage instead if the active location is a Dark location.)

name: Sudden Pitfall
description: When Revealed: The first player must discard 1 questing character he controls. if able. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Dreadful Gap
description: When Revealed: Immediately travel to Dreadful Gap. If another location is currently active. return it to the staging area. X is the number of characters in play.

name: Fouled Well
description: When Revealed: Each player may choose and discard 1 card at random from his hand. If all players did not discard 1 card. Fouled Well gains surge.

name: Black Uruks
description: When Revealed: The first player must choose and discard an attachment from a questing character. if able.

name: Mountain Warg
description: If Mountain Warg is dealt a shadow card with no effect. return Mountain Warg to the staging area after it attacks.

name: Bitter Wind
description: When Revealed: The first player must discard 3 resources from each hero he controls.

name: Knees of the Mountain
description: While Knees of the Mountain is in the staging area. it gains: "Forced: After an enemy engages a player. it gets +1 Attack until the end of the round.

name: Turbulent Waters
description: While Turbulent Waters is the active location. players cannot optionally engage enemies.

name: Warg Lair
description: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Mountain Warg and add it to the staging area. if able. Shuffle the encounter deck. Response: After Warg Lair leaves play as an explored location. each player draws 1 card.

name: Goblin Scout
description: Each player with a threat of 25 or higher cannot optionally engage Goblin Scout.

name: Goblin Swordsman
description: Goblin Swordsman gets +2 Attack if its attack is undefended.

name: Watchful Eyes
description: When Revealed: The first player attaches Watchful Eyes to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Forced: If attached hero is exhausted at the end of the combat phase. reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.")

name: Goblin Tunnels
description: While Goblin Tunnels is in the staging area. it gains: "Forced: After a Goblin is revealed from the encounter deck. remove a progress token from the current quest card."

name: Entering The Mines
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for East-gate and Cave Torch.  Put East-gate into play as the active location. and have the first player attach Cave Torch to a hero of his choice.  Set First Hall and Bridge of Khazad-dum aside. out of play. 
Shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player. and add it to the staging area.

Players cannot advance to the next stage of the scenario unless Bridge of Khazad-dum is in their victory display.

name: Goblin Patrol
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 enemy of his choice. and add it to the staging area.  One choice must be Patrol Leader. if able.
Forced: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck. discard it instead of adding it to the staging area.
If there are no enemies in play. immediately advance to the next stage of the scenario.  (Players can also advance by placing 11 progress tokens on Goblin Patrol.)

name: A Way Up
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: Heroes do not collect resources during the resource phase.
If the players defeat this stage. they win the game.

name: Search for the Chamber
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Book of Mazarbul. and have the first player attach it to a hero of his choice.  Shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player. add  it to the staging area.

name: The Fate of Balin
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: When Revealed: Remove Book of Mazarbul from the game.
Forced: At the end of the staging step. reveal the top X cards of the encounter deck. adding all enemies to the staging area.  Discard the other revealed cards without resolving them.  X is the number of players.
If the players defeat this stage. they win the game.

name: A Presence in the Dark
description:
Side A: Setup: Prepare the quest deck.  Add The Nameless Fear to the staging area.  Remove all copies of A Foe Beyond from the encounter deck.  Then. shuffle 1 copy of A Foe Beyond per player back into the encounter deck.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player. and add it to the staging area.  Then. add A Presence in the Dark to your victory display.

name: Search f or an Exit: Heading Down
description:
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: Forced: If Heading Up is in the players victory display at the end of any quest phase. shuffle Heading Up back into the quest deck.
Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Search f or an Exit: Heading Up
description:
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: Forced: If Heading Down is in the players victory display at the end of any quest phase. shuffle Heading Down back into the quest deck.
Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Search for an Exit: A Wrong Turn
description:
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: Forced: If Heading Down is in the players victory display at the end of any quest phase. shuffle Heading Down back into the quest deck.
Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Search for an Exit: Narrow Paths
description:
Quest. Flight from Moria 2. Khazad-dum x1. Quest Points: 3. VP 1
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 questing character he controls.  Each questing character not chosen does not count its Willpower until the end of the turn.

Forced: After placing 1st progress token on Narrow Paths. search the encounter deck and discard pile for Abandoned Tools and add it to the staging area. if able.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Search for an Exit: Hasty Council
description:
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: When Revealed: Shuffle all copies of A Foe Beyond from the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.  Reveal the top 2 cards of the quest deck.  Choose 1 to become the active quest (flipped to side 2B) and put the other on the bottom of the quest deck.  Then. add Hasty Council to your victory display.

name: Search for an Exit: Blocked by Shadow
description:
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 of the following: 
* Each player discards 1 card from the top of the encounter deck.  If the card is a treachery card. the discarding player is eliminated from the game.
* Reveals the next quest card. putting Blocked by Shadow on the bottom of the quest deck.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.  If the players defeat this stage. they escape and win the game.

name: Search for an Exit: Escape from Darkness
description:
Side A: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card. only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.
Side B: Abandoned Tools gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust attached hero to put a progress token on Escape from Darkness."

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

Progress tokens cannot be placed on Escape from Darkness except by Abandoned Tools.  If the players defeat this stage. they escape and win the game.

name: Elrohir
description: When Elladan is in play. Elrohir gets +2 Defense. Response: After Elrohir is declared as a defender. pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Taking Initiative
description: Action: Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded cards printed cost is equal to or higher than the number of characters you control. draw 2 cards and deal 2 damage to any enemy.

name: Timely Aid
description: Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put 1 revealed ally into play. if able. Shuffle all other revealed cards back into your deck.

name: Unseen Strike
description: Action: Choose a character you control.  Until the end of the phase. that character gets +3 Attack while attacking an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat.

name: Keeping Count
description: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero gets +1 Attack for each resource token on another copy of Keeping Count that is above the current number of resource tokens on this card.    Forced: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy. place 1 resource token on this card.

name: Bofur
description: Quest Action: Spend 1 Spirit resource to put Bofur into play from your hand. exhausted and committed to a guest.  If you quest successfully this phase and Bofur is still in play. return him to your hand.

name: Renewed Friendship
description: Response: After another player plays an attachment on a hero you control. you may (choose 1): ready 1 of that players heroes. have that player draw 1 card. or lower that players threat by 2.

name: Ravenhill Scout
description: Action: Exhaust Ravenhill Scout to move up to 2 progress tokens from 1 location to another location.

name: Needful to Know
description: Action: Raise your threat by 1 to look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then. reduce your threat by X. where X is the threat of that card.

name: Good Meal
description: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Action: Discard Good Meal to lower the cost of the next event you play this round that matches attached heros sphere by 2.

name: Up The Pass
description:
Side A: Setup: Add Caradhras to the staging area. Remove all copies of Snowstorm from the encounter deck and set them aside. out of play. Put Arwen Undomiel into play under the control of the first player.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player. and add it to the staging area.

name: Snowdrifts
description:
Side A: none
Side B: When Revealed: Shuffle 1 more copy of Snowstorm into the encounter deck than the number of players in the game.
Forced: After placing the 11th progress token on Snowdrifts. discard any active location. Caradhras becomes the active location.

name: The Mountains Peaks
description:
Side A: none. 
Side B: When Revealed: Shuffle all copies of Snowstorm in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck. Characters are discarded from play if their Willpower is ever 0.
Players cannot defeat this stage unless they have 5 victory points. If the players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Arwen Undomiel
description:
The first player gains control of Arwen Undomiel. as an ally.
Response: After Arwen Undomiel exhausts. choose a hero. Add 1 resource to the heros resource pool. If Arwen Undomiel leaves play. the players are defeated.

name: Caradhras
description: While Caradhras is the active location. questing characters get -1 Willpower. Players cannot travel to Caradhras except by quest card effects.

name: Fanuidhol
description: While Fanuidhol is the active location. heroes must spend 1 resource pool to count their Willpower during the quest phase.

name: Celebdil
description: While Celebdil is the active location. remove 2 progress tokens from it at the end of each round.

name: The Dimrill Stair
description: Travel: Reshuffle all locations in the discard pile and victory display back into the encounter deck. If you reshuffled at least two locations. reduce each players threat by 11 and discard all copies of Freezing Cold from play.

name: Rocky Crags
description: Travel: Each player must deal 2 damage to 1 character he controls to travel here.

name: Fell Voices
description: When Revealed: Return the top 2 Snow cards in the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck. If this effect returned less than 2 Snow treachery cards. Fell Voices gains surge.

name: Fallen Stones
description: When Revealed: The first player (choose 1): removes all progress tokens from play. or reveals 2 cards from the encounter deck and adds them to the staging area.

name: Snowstorm
description: When Revealed: Each questing character gets -1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Freezing Cold
description: When Revealed: The first player attaches this card to a hero he controls. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero gets -2 Willpower and cannot commit to a quest. If attached hero has more that 1 copy of Freezing Cold attached. discard attached hero from play."

name: Avalanche!
description: When Revealed: Exhaust each ready character and if it is the quest phase commit them to the quest.

name: Mountain Goblin
description: Mountain Goblin gets +1 Attack for each Mountain location in the staging area.

name: Mountain Troll
description: Mountain Troll gets +1 Attack for each Mountain location in the staging area.

name: Snow Warg
description:
Allies cannot defend while Snow Warg is attacking.
Forced: When Snow Warg attacks. deal 1 damage to the defending character. if able.

Erratad: Should read: “Forced: After a character is declared as a defender against Snow Warg. deal 1 damage to the defending character. if able.”

name: Elladan
description:
While Elrohir is in play. Elladan gets +2 Attack.
Response: After Elladan is declared as an attacker. pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Lure of Moria
description: Action: Ready all Dwarf characters.

name: Rivendell Blade
description:
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. Restricted.
When attached character attacks an enemy. that enemy gets -2 Defense until the end of the phase.

name: Hail of Stones
description: Action: Exhaust X characters to deal X damage to an enemy in the staging area.

name: Rider of the Mark
description:
Action: Spend 1 Spirit resource to give control of Rider of the Mark to another player. (Limit once per round.)
Response: After Rider of the Mark changes control. discard a shadow card dealt to an enemy you are engaged with.

name: Song of Eärendil
description:
Attach to a Spirit hero. Response: After Song of Eärendil enters play. draw 1 card.
Response: After another player raises his threat. raise your threat by 1 to reduce that players threat by 1.

name: Bombur
description: Action: Exhaust Bombur to choose a location. That location gets   -1 Threat until the end of the phase. (That location does not contribute its Threat instead if it is an Underground location.)

name: Out of the Wild
description: Action: Search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for any 1 non-objective card worth no victory points and add it to your victory display. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The End Comes
description: Response: After a Dwarf character leaves play. shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

name: Along the Misty Mountains
description:
Side A: Setup: Put Arwen Undomiel into play under the control of the first player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player. and add them to the staging area. 
Side B: none.

name: Orc Outpost
description:
Side A: none. 
Side B: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Goblin Gate and add it to the staging area. if able. Then. if there is no active location. Goblin Gate becomes the active location.

name: Approaching Rivendell
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player. and add it to the staging area.
Characters cannot be healed.
If the players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Arwen Undomiel
description:
The first player gains control of Arwen Undomiel. as an ally.
Response: After Arwen Undomiel exhausts. choose a hero. Add 1 resource to the heros resource pool. If Arwen Undomiel leaves play. the players are defeated.

name: Ruined Road
description: Response: After you travel to Ruined Road. the first player places 2 progress tokens on it or readies 1 hero he controls.

name: Goblin Gate
description: While Goblin Gate is the active location. the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round gains ambush. If that enemy engages a player. it makes an immediate attack (deal and resolve a shadow card).

name: Pathless Country
description: Forced: After at least 1 progress token is placed on Pathless Country. remove 1 progress token from it.

name: Barren Hills
description: While Barren Hills is the active location. ignore ambush.

name: Sleeping Sentry
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. Then. exhaust all ready characters.

name: Followed by Night
description: When Revealed: The first player (choose 1): deals 1 damage to all allies in play and Followed by Night gains surge. or all enemies engaged with players make an immediate attack. if able.

name: Orc Ambush
description: When Revealed: All Orc enemies in the staging area engage the first player. If there are no Orc enemies in the staging area. return all Orc enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area. if able.

name: Goblin Taskmaster
description:
Ambush (After this enemy enters play. each player makes an engagement check against it.)
Forced: After Goblin Taskmaster engages a player. that player deals 2 damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Orc Raiders
description:
Ambush (After this enemy enters play. each player makes an engagement check against it.)
Forced: After Orc Raiders engages a player. that player discards 2 attachments he controls. if able.

name: Crebain
description: While Crebain is in the staging area. encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

name: Wild Bear
description:
Ambush (After this enemy enters play. each player makes an engagement check against it.)
Forced: After Wild Bear engages a player. it makes an immediate attack.

name: Aragorn (WitW)
description: Refresh Action: Reduce your threat to your starting threat level. (Limit once per game.)

name: Grave Cairn
description: Response: After a character leaves play. add its Defense to another characters Defense until the end of the round.

name: Sword that was Broken
description: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Leadership resource icon. If attached hero is Aragorn. each character you control gets +1 Willpower.

name: Watcher of the Bruinen
description:
Watcher of the Bruinen does not exhaust to defend.
Forced: After Watcher of the Bruinen defends. either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Rivendell Bow
description:
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. or to Aragorn.
Limit 1 per character.
Attached character gains ranged. If attached character has a printed ranged keyword. it gets +1 Attack during a ranged attack.

name: Arwen Undomiel
description: Response: After Arwen Undomiel exhausts. choose a character. That character gains sentinel and gets +1 Defense until the end of the round.

name: Elronds Counsel
description: Action: If you control a unique Noldor character. give another character +1 Willpower until the end of the phase and lower your threat by 3.

name: Short Cut
description: Response: After a location enters play. exhaust a Hobbit character to shuffle that location back into the encounter deck. Then. reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

name: Legacy of Durin
description:
Attach to a Dwarf hero.
Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand. draw 1 card.

name: Resourceful
description:
Attach to a hero you control.
Attached hero collects 1 additional resource during the resource phase each round.

name: To the West-door
description:
Side A: Setup: Remove The Watcher and Doors of Durin from the encounter deck and set them aside. out of play.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal cards from the top of the encounter deck and add them to the staging area until there is at least X Threat in the staging area. X is twice the number of players in the game.

name: The Seething Lake
description:
Side A: none.
Side B: When Revealed: Add The Watcher to the staging area. Doors of Durin becomes the active location. moving any previous active location to the staging area. Shuffle all Tentacle cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.
If the players have at least 3 victory points and defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Doors of Durin
description: Progress tokens that would be placed on the Doors of Durin are instead placed on the current quest card. Action: Each player may discard any number of cards from his hand. Then. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the first letter of the encounter cards title matches that of one of the discarded player cards. add Doors of Durin to your victory display. (Limit once per round.)

name: Sair Falls
description: Travel: The first player must exhaust 2 characters to travel here.

name: Perilous Swamp
description: No more than 1 progress token can be placed on Perilous Swamp each round.

name: Makeshift Passage
description: Forced: After you travel to Makeshift Passage. place 2 progress tokens on the current quest card. bypassing any active location.

name: Stagnant Creek
description: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is a Tentacle enemy. add that card to the staging area and raise each players threat by 5.

name: Ill Purpose
description: When Revealed: All enemies in the staging area engage the player with the highest threat. Then. each player raises his threat by the total Threat of all cards in the staging area.

name: The Watcher
description: While there is another Tentacle enemy in play. The Watcher cannot be optionally engaged. If The Watcher is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase. each player must deal 3 damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Grasping Tentacle
description: Forced: When Grasping Tentacle is attacked. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy. attach this card to an attacking character as a Tentacle attachment with the text: "Attached characters Attack and Defense are reduced to 0."

name: Striking Tentacle
description: Forced: When Striking Tentacle attacks. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy. this attack is considered undefended.

name: Thrashing Tentacle
description: Forced: When Thrashing Tentacle is attacked. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy. deal the damage from the attack to 1 character an attacking player controls (ignoring defense).

name: Wrapped
description: When Revealed: The first player attaches Wrapped! to a hero he controls. (Counts as a Tentacle attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot exhaust or ready. At the end of the round. discard attached hero from play. Combat Action: Exhaust a hero you control without a Tentacle attachment to discard Wrapped!.")

name: Hama
description: Response: After Hama is declared as an attacker. return a [Tactics] event from your discard pile to your hand. Then. choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Erestor
description: Action: Choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Fresh Tracks
description: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area. deal 1 damage to that enemy. Players ignore that enemy while making engagement checks this round.

name: Erebor Battle Master
description: Erebor Battle Master gets +1 [Attack] for each other Dwarf character you control.

name: Ring Mail
description: Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character. Restricted. Attached character gets +1 hit point and +1 [Defense].

name: Out of Sight
description: Action: Enemies engaged with you cannot attack this phase.

name: Ever My Heart Rises
description: Attach to a Dwarf character. Response: After you travel to a Mountain or Underground location. ready attached character and reduce your threat by 1.

name: Warden of Healing
description: Action: Exhaust Warden of Healing to heal 1 damage on up to 2 different characters. Then. you may pay 2 [Lore] resources to ready Warden of Healing.

name: Word of Command
