description: Action: Exhaust an Istari character to search your deck for 1 card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Love of Tales
description: Attach to a [Lore] hero. Limit 1 per hero. Response: After a Song card is played. add 1 resource to attached heros resource pool.

name: Journey in the Black Pit
description:
Side A: Setup: The first player attaches Cave Torch to a hero of his choice.
Side B: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter decks until you discard X locations. where X is one less than the number of players in the game (minimum of 1). Add those locations to the staging area. and shuffle the other discarded cards back into the encounter deck.

Each location gets +1 [Threat]. If the players quest unsuccessfully. trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

name: Continuing Eastward
description:
Side B: When Revealed: The first player makes a locate test. If this test is failed. reveal cards from the encounter deck equal to the number of players in the game and add them to the staging area. Then. trigger all "Lost:" effects in play

If the players quest unsuccessfully. trigger all "Lost:" effects in play. If the players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Durins Greaves
description: When Revealed: The first player attaches Durins Greaves to a hero of his choice as an attachment. Attached hero gains +1 [Defense]

name: Abandoned Mine
description: Lost: Return the top 2 Goblin enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area. if able. (PASS)

name: Dwarven Forge
description: Lost: Each player must choose and discard 1 card from his hand. (PASS )

name: Silent Caverns
description: Lost: Exhaust all characters. (PASS)

name: Twisting Passage
description: Forced: Before placing progress tokens on Twisting Passage. the first player must make a locate test. If this test is failed. do not place any progress tokens on Twisting Passage and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play. (PASS)

name: Fatigue
description: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust 1 character he controls. if able. Then. if any player controls no unexhausted characters. Fatigue gains surge.

name: Foul Air
description: When Revealed: The first player makes a locate test. If this test is failed. deal 2 damage to all characters and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play. (PASS)

name: Gathering Ground
description: When Revealed: Attach this card to a location in the staging area with the highest combined threat and remaining quest points. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Each enemy revealed from the encounter deck gains surge.") (PASS)

name: Vast and Intricate
description: When Revealed: The first player makes a locate test. If this test is failed. raise each players threat by 7. remove all progress tokens from play. and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

name: Cave Spider
description: When Revealed: The first player draws 1 card. Then. that player must choose and discard 4 cards from his hand. if able. Forced: After Cave Spider engages a player. that player must choose and discard 1 card from his hand. if able.

name: Goblin Sneak
description: Forced: After Goblin Sneak engages a player. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If it is a treachery card. Goblin Sneak engages the next player. if able.

name: Goblin Warlord
description: Lost: Each player must choose and discard 1 ally he controls from play. if able.

name: Rock Adder
description: Rock Adder cannot be attacked unless it has dealt at least 1 damage this round.

name: Glorfindel (FoS)
description: Forced: After Glorfindel exhausts to commit to a quest. raise your threat by 1.

name: Longbeard Elder
description: Response: After Longbeard Elder commits to a quest. look at the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a location. place 1 progress token on the current quest. Otherwise Longbeard Elder gets -1 [Willpower] until the end of the phase.

name: Path of Need
description: Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a location. Heroes do not exhaust to attack. defend. or commit to a quest while attached location is the active location.

name: Trollshaw Scout
description: Trollshaw Scout does not exhaust to attack. Forced: After Trollshaw Scout attacks. either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Heavy Stroke
description: Response: After a Dwarf deals X damage to an enemy during combat. deal and additional X damage to that enemy. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Imladris Stargazer
description: Action: Exhaust Imladris Stargazer to choose a player. That player looks at the top 5 cards of his deck and then returns them to the top of his deck in any order.

name: Light of Valinor
description: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero. Attached hero does not exhaust to commit to a quest.

name: Daerons Runes
description: Action: Draw 2 cards. Then. discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Healing Herbs
description: Attach to a [Lore] hero. Action: Discard Healing Herbs and exhaust attached hero to heal all damage on 1 character.

name: Asfaloth
description: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero. Action: Exhaust Asfaloth to place 1 progress token on any location. (2 tokens instead if attached hero is Glorfindel.

name: The Dripping Walls
description:
Side A: Setup: Place the Foundations of Stone encounter set aside. out of play. The first player attaches Cave Torch to a hero of his choice.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player and add it to the staging area.

name: The Waters Edge
description: Side B: Forced: After a player commits characters to the quest. he must discard the top 2 cards of his deck.

name: Washed Away
description: Side B: When Revealed: Discard all Item. Armor. Weapon. Light cards and all encounter deck cards from play. Shuffle all enemy and treachery cards in the counter discard pile together with the Foundations of Stone encounter set. This deck becomes the new encounter deck. Remove all other encounter deck cards from the game. Then. starting with the first player. each player draws a random stage 4 quest card. Remove all other stage 4 quest cards from the game.

name: Below the Mines/Sheltered Rocks
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Reveal 2 cards from the encounter deck and add them to your staging area.

Forced: After the 11th progress token is placed on the Sheltered Rocks. join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player. all players continue on to stage 5 together.

name: Below the Mines/The Endless Caves
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Discard all resources from your heroes.

Forced: After the 17th progress token is placed on The Endless Caves. join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player. all players continue on to stage 5 together.

name: Below the Mines/The Shivering Bank
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Discard your hand. Reveal 2 cars from the encounter deck and add them to your staging area.

Forced: After the 7th progress token is placed on The Shivering Bank. join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player. all players continue on to stage 5 together.

name: Below the Mines/Old One Lair
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Reveal 4 cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area.

Forced: After the 5th progress token is placed on One One Lair. join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player. all players continue on to stage 5 together.

name: Out of Dthe Depths
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player. and add it to the staging area.

Each player cannot commit more allies to the quest than the number of heroes he is also committing to the quest.

If players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Durins Axe
description: Attached hero gets +3 [Attack]. If attached hero is a Dwarf. it gets +1 [Willpower]. Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then. attach Durins Axe to that hero as an attachment.

name: Durins Helm
description: Attached hero gets +1 [Defense]. If attached hero is a Dwarf.it gets +2 hit points. Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then. attach Durins Helm to that hero as an attachment.

name: Drowned Treasury
description: If Drowned Treasury is the active location at the end of the quest phase. each player must discard 1 character he controls. Response: After Drowned Treasury leaves play as an explored location. each player may draw 2 cards or claim 1 objective in play.

name: Mithril Lode
description: While Mithril Lode is the active location. it gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust a character you control to place X progress tokens on the current quest card. bypassing any active location. X is the exhausted characters [Willpower]. (Limit once per round.)"

name: Deep Deep Dark
description: When Revealed: Attach 1 card from the top of the first players deck to each Nameless enemy in play. if able.

name: Lost and Alone
description: When Revealed: Each player chooses and shuffles a hero he controls into his deck. When he draws that hero. he puts it into play.

name: Nameless Thing
description: Forced: After Nameless Thing engages a player. attach the top 2 cards of that players deck to it. X is the printed cost of all attached cards on this card. If there are no cards attached. X is 3.

name: Elder Nameless Thing
description: Forced: After Elder Nameless Thing engages a player. attach the top 3 cards of that players deck to it. X is the printed cost of all attached cards on this card. If there are no cards attached. X is 4.

name: Moria Bats
description: Only characters with ranged can attack or defend against Moria Bats. While Moria Bats is engaged with a player. it gets +1 [Attack] for each other enemy engaged with that player.

name: Elrond
description: You may spend resources from Elronds resource pool to pay for [Spirit]. [Leadership]. and [Tactics] allies. Response: After a character is healed by another card effect. heal 1 damage on it.

name: We Are Not Idle
description: Action: Exhaust X Dwarf characters to add X resources to a heros resource pool and draw 1 card.

name: Hardy Leadership
description: Unique. Attach to a [Leadership] hero. Each Dwarf character gets +1 hit point.

name: Hands Upon the Bow
description: Action: Exhaust a character you control with ranged to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against an enemy in the staging area. It gets +1 [Attack] during this attack.

name: O Elbereth! Gilthonial!
description: Response: After an enemy attacks you. put that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck. If your threat is lower than that enemys engagement cost. set your threat equal to the engagement cost of that enemy.

name: Miruvor
description: Attach to a hero. Action: Discard Miruvor to (choose two): ready attached hero. add 1 resource to attached heros resource pool. attached hero gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the round. or put Miruvor on the top of your deck.

name: Master of the Forge
description: Action: Exhaust Master of the Forge to search the top 5 cards of your deck for any 1 attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Peace. and Thought
description: Refresh Action: Exhaust 2 heroes to draw 5 cards.

name: Risk Some Light
description: Action: Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. You may select 1 card and move it to the bottom of the encounter deck. Return any unselected cards to the top of the encounter deck. in any order.

name: Vilya
description:
Attach to Elrond. He gains a [Spirit] resource icon.
Action: Exhaust Elrond and Vilya to reveal the top card of your deck. You can immediately play or put into play the revealed card for no cost. if able. Otherwise. move the revealed card to the bottom of your deck.

name: Nearing the Gate
description:
Side A: Setup: Remove Dark Pit from the encounter deck and place it aside. out of play. Add Durins Bane to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: When Revealed: Reduce each players threat to 0. Reveal X cards from the encounter deck. where X is one less than the number of players in the game. and add them to the staging area.

name: The Rear Guard
description:
Side B: Forced: If at least 1 hero committed to the quest this round. place 4 progress tokens on The Rear Guard (bypassing any active location) at the end of the quest phase.
If Durins Bane has 0 hit points. advance to the next stage of the scenario immediately.

name: Last Lord of Moria
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Durins Bane makes an immediate attack on the first player. Add Dark Pit to the staging area.
Players cannot win the game while Durins Bane is in play. If Durins Bane leaves play by the effect on Dark Pit. the players have won the game.

name: Dark Pit
description: While Dark Pit is the active location it gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust X characters (maximum 3) you control to discard the top X cards of your deck. If all discarded cards have a higher combined printed cost than the remaining hit points of Durins Bane. discard Durins Bane from play."

name: Second Hall
description: While Second Hall is the active location. it gains: "Forced: after a character leaves play. reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area."

name: Second Deep
description: While Durins Bane has no damage on it. progress tokens cannot be placed on Second Deep.

name: Fires in the Deep
description: When Revealed: Each player must discard 1 ally he controls. if able. If Fires in the Deep discarded no allies. it gains surge.

name: Counter-Spell
description: When Revealed: Attach Counter-spell to Durins Bane. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: When a player plays an event. discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a treachery card. cancel the effects of the event. discard the event players hand. and discard Counter-spell from play.")

name: Inner Flame
description: When Revealed: Durins Bane gets +3 [Attack] until the end of the round. The first player may remove 1 questing hero he controls from the quest to cancel this effect.

name: Inner Shadow
description: When Revealed: Heal 5 damage from Durins Bane. if able. The first player may remove 1 questing hero he controls from the quest to cancel this effect.

name: Whip Lash
description:
When Revealed: Each player must discard 1 attachment he controls. if able.
Shadow: If attacking enemy is Durins Bane. the defending player discards all attachments he controls.

name: Leaping Flame
description: When Revealed: Durins Bane makes an immediate attack against the first player (deal and resolve a shadow card).

name: Durins Bane
description: Players cannot play attachments on Durins Bane. Durins Bane cannot leave the staging area. is considered to be engaged with each player whose threat is 1 or greater. and attacks each of those players in turn during the combat phase (deal and discard a new shadow card each attack).

name: Ranging Goblin
description: When Revealed: Each player must deal 1 damage to a hero he controls. Forced: After a character leaves play. shuffle Ranging Goblin and the top card in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

name: Firey Sword
description: When Revealed: Attach Fiery Sword to Durins Bane as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Attached enemy gets +3 [Attack]."

name: Many Thonged Whip
description: When Revealed: Attach Many Thonged Whip to Durins Bane as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Forced: When Durins Bane attacks. the defending player must discard 1 card at random from his hand."

name: Beregond
description: Lower the cost to play Weapon and Armor attachments on Beregond by 2.

name: Boromir
description: While Boromir has at least 1 resource in his resource pool. Gondor allies get +1 Attack.

name: Errand-rider
description: Action: Exhaust Errand-rider to move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another heros resource pool.

name: Citadel Custodian
description: Lower the cost to play Citadel Custodian by 1 for each Gondor ally in play.

name: Mutual Accord
description: Action: Until the end of the phase. each Gondor card in play gains the Rohan trait. and each Rohan card in play gains the Gondor trait.

name: Wealth of Gondor
description: Action: Choose a Gondor hero. Add 1 resource to that heros resource pool.

name: Behind Strong Walls
description: Action: Ready a defending Gondor character. That character gets +1 [Defense] until the end of the phase.

name: Spear of the Citadel
description:
Attach to a Tactics character. Restricted.
Limit 1 per character.
Response: After attached character is declared as a defender. deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Damrod
description: Action: Discard Damrod from play to lower your threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

name: Light the Beacons
description: Action: All characters get +2 [Defense] and do not exhaust to defend until the end of the round.

name: A Watchful Place
description: Response: After a location leaves play as an explored location. return it to the top of the encounter deck.

name: Blood of Numenor
description:
Attach to a Gondor of Dunedain hero.
Action: Spend 1 resource from attached heros resource pool to give attached hero +1 [Defense] for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase)

name: Hunter of Lamedon
description: Response: After you play Hunter of Lamedon from your hand. reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Outlands card. add it to your hand. Otherwise discard it.

name: Ithilien Tracker
description: Action: Exhaust Ithilien Tracker to lower the Threat of the next enemy added to the staging area to 0 until the end of the phase.

name: Master of Lore
description:
Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play [Lore] cards of that type by 1 until the end of the phase (to a minimum of 1).

Errata: Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play the next [Lore] card of that type by 1 until the end of the phase (to a 
minimum of 1).

name: Ranger Spikes
description:
Play Ranger Spikes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached. attach Ranger Spikes to the next elegible enemy that enters the staging area.
Players do not make engagement checks against attached enemy. Attached enemy gets -2 [Threat].

name: Envoy of Pelargir
description: Response: After Envy of Pelargir enters play. add 1 resource to a Gondor or Noble heros resource pool.

name: Alcrons Scroll
description:
If unattached. return Alacrons Scroll to the staging area and it gains "Action: Exhaust a hero to attach Alcarons Scroll to that hero."
Forced: When the hero with Alcarons Scroll attached is damaged by an enemy attack. attach Alcarons Scroll to that enemy.

name: Harbor Thug
description: Forced: When the player whose hero has Alcarons Scroll attached raises his threat. Harbor Thug engages that player.

name: The Leaping Fish
description: If Alcarons Scroll is attached to a hero. The Leaping Fish gains: "Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase discard X cards from the top of the encounter decki where X is the number of players in the game. Add each enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

name: Pelargir Docks
description: While Pelargir Docks is the active location. enemies get +1 Attack and +1 Defense.

name: Harbor Storehouse
description: Forced: Each time a location is discarded from the top of the encounter deck. raise each players threat by 1.

name: Collateral Damage
description: When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the top of the encounter deck. Discard an additional 2 cards for each copy of  Collateral Damage in the discard pile. Then. raise each players threat by 2 for each location discarded by this effect.

name: Celador
description:
While Celador is in the staging area. he is committed to the current quest.
Forced: After players quest unsuccessfully or a character leaves play. deal 1 damage to Celador.
If Celador leaves play. remove him from the game.

name: Ithilien Guardian
description:
While Ithilien Guardian is in the staging area. he is committed to the current quest.
When Revealed: Add Ithilien Guardian to the staging area and Ithilien Guardian gains surge.

name: Southron Company
description: Southron Company gets +2 Threat and +2 Attack while the current quest card has the battle or siege keyword.

name: Ithilien Road
description: While Ithilien Road is the active location. the engagement cost of the each enemy in the staging area is 0.

name: Blocking Wargs
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character committed to the quest. (If the current quest has the battle or siege keyword. shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.)

name: Orc Scramblers
description: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each Battleground location in play. if able.

name: Battering Ram
description: When Revealed: If the active location is a Battleground. deal 3 damage to it.

name: Siege Raft
description: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to the lowest Threat Battleground location in play. if able.

name: The Citadel
description:
If The Citadel has 11 or more dadmage. remove it from the game (do not collect its victory points).
Response: After The Citadel leaves play as an explored location. remove stage 4 from the quest deck. if able.

name: The Approach
description:
If The Approach has 7 or more damage. remove it from the game (do not collect its victory points).
Response: After The Approach leaves play as an explored location. remove stage 3 from the quest deck. if able.

name: The Banks
description:
If The Banks has 3 or more damage. remove it from the game (do not collect its victory points).
Response: After The Banks leaves play as an explored lcoation. remove stage 2 from the quest deck. if able.

name: Orc Assault
description: When Revealed: Each character gets -2 Attack and -2 Defense until the end of the round.

name: Pickpocket
description: Forced: When Pickpocket attacks. the defending player discards 1 resource from one of his heroes resource pools and 1 card at random from his hand.

name: City Street
description: While City Street is in the staging area. players cannot travel to a locatin that does not have the title City Street.

name: Market Square
description:
Immune to player card effects.
Travel: Each player must spend 1 resource from one of his heroes resource pools to travel here.

name: Lost in the City
description: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 City location and add it to the staging area. if able. Shuffle the encounter deck. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Local Trouble
description: When Revealed: Attach this car to the hero with the highest threat cost witout a copy of Local Trouble attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "When attached hero exhausts. readies. or triggers an ability. raise its controllers threat by 1.")

name: Zealous Traitor
description: Forced: When Zealous Traitor engages a player. that player must deal 1 damage to each ally he controls. (2 damage instead if Zealous Traitor was not optionally engaged.)

name: Lossarnach Bandit
description: Forced: When Lossarnach Bandit engages a player. that player discards 1 resource from each of his heroes resources pools. (2 resources instead if Lossarnach Bandit was not optionally engaged.)

name: Umbar Assassin
description:
Archery 2.
Forced: When Umbar Assassin engages a player. that player must deal 3 damage to a hero he controls. (Discard that hero instead if Umbar Assassin was not optionally engaged.)

name: Lurking in Shadows
description: When Revealed: Return all Brigand enemies engaged with players to the staging area. If this effect returned no Brigand enemies to the staging area. Lurking in Shadows gains surge.

name: Overgrown Trail
description: Action: Exhaust a Ranger character to place 3 progress tokens on Overgrown Trail.

name: Secluded Glade
description: Immune to player card effects.

name: Lost Companion
description: When Revealed: Each player removes 1 character he controls from the quest. if able. Then. if any player has no characters committed to the quest. remove all characters from the quest.

name: Morgul Spider
description: When Revealed: Until the end of the round. Morgul Spider gets +1 [Attack] for each character not currently committed to a quest.

name: Forest Bat
description: When Revealed: The first player deals 2 damage to a questing hero and removes that hero from the quest.

name: Watcher in the Wood
description: When Revealed: Raise each players threat by the number of questing characters. (If the current quest has the battle or siege keyword. Watcher in the Wood gains surge.)

name: Southron Mercenaries
description:
Archery X.
X is the number of players in the game. 
Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [Attack]. (+3 [Attack] instead if it has the Harad trait.)

name: Haradrim Elite
description: Forced: When Haradrim Elite enters play. it makes an immediate attack from the staging area against the first player.

name: Mumak
description: No attachments can be attached to Mumak. Mumak cannot take more than 3 damage each round.

name: Southron Support
description: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Harad enemy and add it to the staging area. if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Lieutenant of Moror
description:
Allies cannot defend against Lieutenant of Mordor.
When Revealed: Resolve the "when revealed" effect on the topmost treachery card in the encounter discard pile. if able. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Orc Arbalesters
description: X is the number of different resource icons ([Leadership]. [Tactics]. [Spirit]. or [Lore]) on heroes in play.

name: Orc Vanguard
description: While Orc Vanguard is in the staging area. resources cannot be spent from the resource pools of heroes who have a [Leadership]. [Spirit]. or [Lore] resource icon.

name: Orc War Camp
description: If an Orc enemy is in play. progress tokens cannot be placed on Orc War Camp while it is in the staging area.

name: The Masters Malice
description: When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 sphere of influence ([Leadership]. [Tactics]. [Spirit]. or [Lore]). Each character a player controls that does not belong to his chosen sphere takes 3 damage.

name: The Power of Mordor
description: When Revealed: Count the number of encounter cards in the staging area and shuffle them into the encounter deck. Then. reveal an equal number of cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Orc Rabble
description: Forced: When Orc Rabble is dealt a shadow card. it gets +2 [Attack] until the end of the phase.

name: Orc Arsonist
description: Forced: When Orc Arsonist engages a player. deal 1 shadow card to each enemy engaged with that player.

name: Scourge of Mordor
description: When Revealed: Each player discards the top card of his deck. Until the end of the phase. raise the total [Threat] in the staging area by X. where X is the total cost of all cards discarded by this effect.

name: The Leaping Fish
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for The Leaping Fish and Alcarons Scroll. Make The Leaping Fish the active location and attach Alcarons Scroll to a hero.
Side B: Battle. (Characters use their [Attack] and [Will] when questing)
When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck for a copy of Harbor Thug and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Fighting in the Streets
description:
Side B: Battle. (Characters use their [Attack] and [Will] when questing)
The players cannot advance to the next stage unless Alcarons Scroll is attached to a hero.
When Revealed: Attach Alcarons Scroll to the highest engagement cost enemy in play. if able. Otherwise. Add Alcarons Scroll to the staging area.

name: Escape to the Quays
description:
Side A:When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 enemy and adds it to the staging area.
Side B: Enemies cannot be optionally engaged.
Forced: The first enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round makes an immediate attack against the player who controls Alcarons Scroll from the staging area.
The players cannot defeat this stage unless Alcarons Scroll is attached to a hero. If the players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Abush in Ithilien
description:
Side A: Setup: Add Celador to the staging area. Search the encounter deck for a copy of Ithilien Road and make it the active location.
Each player must search the encounter deck for a copy of Southron Company and add it to the staging area.
Shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: Battle. (Characters use [Attack] instead of [Willpower] when questing.)
If the players complete this stage with Celador in the staging area. advance to stage 3A (bypassing stage 2).

name: Sourthron Counter-Attack
description:
Side B: Siege. (Characters use [Defense] instead of [Willpower] when questing.)
Archery X.
X is the number of players in the game.
After this stage is completed. advance to stage 4A (bypassing stage 3).

name: The Hidden Way
description:
Side B: When Revealed: The first player takes control of all Ranger objectives in the staging area.
Enemies do not makie engagement checks and cannot be optionally engaged.

name: Approaching Cair Andros
description:
Side B: If any players threat is 37 or higher. Approaching Cair Andros gains siege.
Forced: At the end of each round. raise each players threat by 2.
If players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: The Defense
description:
Side A: Setup: Add The Approach. The Citadel. and The Banks to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: Siege. (Characters quest using [Defense] instead of [Willpower].)
Players must deal damage from undefended attacks to the lowest [Threat] Battleground location in play. If there are no Battleground locations in play. immediately advance to the next stage.

name: Reinforcing the Banks
description: Side B: Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area during the staging step each round.

name: Breakthrough at the Approach
description:
Side B: Battle. (Characters quest using [Attack] instead of [Willpower].)
Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully. instead of raising threat. each player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

name: Breakthrough at the Citadel
description:
Side B: Siege. (Characters use [Defense] instead of [Willpower] when questing.)
Breakthrough at the Citadel adds 5 [Threat] to the staging area.

name: The Last Battle
description:
Side B: Siege. (Characters quest using [Defense] instead of [Willpower].
When Revealed: Reveal 1 card per player from the encoutner deck and add it to the staging area.
If the players have collected 4 or more victory points. The Last Battle gains battle and loses siege.
If the players defeat this tage. they have won the game.

name: Hirluin the Fair
description: You may use resources from Hirluin the Fairs resource pool to pay for Outlands ally cards of any sphere.

name: Warrior of Lossarnach
description: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 [Defense]

name: Gaining Strength
description: Action: Discard 2 resources from your heros resource pool to add 3 resources to that heros resource pool.

name: Knights of the Swan
description: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 [Attack]

name: Gondorian Shield
description:
Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Limit 1 per hero.
Attached hero gains +1 [Defense]. (+2 [Defense] instead if attached hero has the Gondor trait.)

name: Ethir Swordsman
description: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 [Willpower]

name: Ring of Barahir
description:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 hit points for each Artifact attachment attached to it.
If attached hero is Aragorn. he also gains a [Lore] resource icon.

name: Anfalas Herdsman
description: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 hit point.

name: Mithrandirs Advice
description: Action: Draw 1 card for each hero you control with a printed [Lore] resource icon.

name: A Good Harvest
description: Action: Name a sphere. Until the end of the phase. you can spend resources of any sphere when paying for cards that belong to the named sphere.

name: Conspiracy
description:
Side A: Setup: Create the underworld deck. Remove Roots of the Mindolluin from the encounter decks and set it aside. out of play. Shuffle all Villain cards and randomly set one aside. out of play. without looking at it. Remove the others from the game. Repeat this with all Plot cards.
Side B: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for The Fourth Star and make it the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location. place 1 resource token on this quest.
If there are 4 or more resource tokens on Conspiracy. advance to the next stage.

name: The Grand Design
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Reveal the set aside Plot card and add it to the staging area.
Side B: When Revealed: Make Roots of the Mindolluin the active location. returning any other active locations to the staging area.
Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location place 1 resource token on this quest.
If there are 4 or more resource tokens on The Grand Design. advance to the next stage.

name: The Confrontation
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Reveal the set aside Villain card and add it to the staging area.
Side B: When Revealed: Shuffle the underworld deck into the encounter deck.
The players cannot defeat this stage while a Villain is in play. If this stage is defeated. the players have won the game.

name: Underworld Dissident
description: Underworld Dissident gets +1 [Attack] for each Underworld location in play.

name: Daughter of Beruthiel
description:
Daugher of Beruthield cannot be optionall engaged.
Forced: After Daughter of Beruthiel attacks. return her to the staging area. The engaged player may raise his threat by 4 to prevent this effect.

name: The Hand of Castamir
description:
Forced: After the Hand of Castamir attacks. reveal the top card of the encounter deck. resolve its effects. and discard it.
Forced: After a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck. The Hand of Castamir makes an immediate attack against the first player.

name: Telemnars Bane
description:
Forced: When Telemnars Bane attacks. discard the top 3 cards of each players deck.
Forced: After a player plays an event card. Telemnars Bane makes an immediate attack against the first player.

name: Sewers
description: When Revealed: Place the top card of the underworld deck facedown underneath the active location. if able.

name: Roots of Mindolluin
description: Each location in the staging area gets +2 Quest points.

name: Houses of the Dead
description: Forced: After Houses of the Dead becomes the active location. exhaust all characters.

name: The Fourth Star
description:
X is the number of players in the game.
Response: When The Fourth Star leaves play as an explored location. each player may draw 1 card.

name: Unwelcome Discovery
description: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the underworld deck and add it to the staging area. If it is a Clue card. discard it instead.

name: A Knife in the Back
description:
When Revealed: Random select 1 ally controlled by the first player. if able. The first player deals X damage to one of his heroes. where X is that allys [Attack]. Then discard that ally.
If no ally is discarded by this effect. A Knife in the Back gains surge.

name: False Lead
description: When Revealed: End the quest phase without resolving the quest.

name: A Scrap of History
description: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. add it to the victory display. and place 1 resource token on the current quest.

name: Secret Map
description:
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective and attach it to that hero.
Action: If attached to a hero. add Secret Map to the victory display to place 3 progress tokens on the active location.

name: A Prisoner
description: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. add it to the victory display. and place 2 resource tokens on the current quest.

name: Unholy Alliance
description:
Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area during the staging step each round.
If a hero is destroyed by an enemy attack. the players have lost the game.

name: Up in Flames
description:
Forced: At the end of the round. place 1 resource token on Up in Flames and discard the top X cards of each players deck. X is the number of resource tokens on Up in Flames.
If any player has no carrds in his deck. the players have lost the game.

name: Poisoned Counsels
description: At the end of each round. raise each players threat by 2.

name: Mirlonde
description: Each hero  you control with a printed [Lore] resource icon gets -1 threat cost.

name: Forlong
description: While you control Outlands allies that belong to 4 different spheres. ready Forlong at the beginning of each phase.

name: Strength of Arms
description:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed [Leadership] resource icon.
Action: Ready each ally in play.

name: Mighty Prowess
description:
Attach to a [Tactics] hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy. deal 1 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the enemy just destroyed.

name: Trained for War
description:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed [Tactics] resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase. if the current quest has no keyword it gains battle.
(Characters quest using [Attack] instead of [Willpower].)

name: Silvan Refugee
description: Forced: After a character leaves play. discard Silvan Refugee from play.

name: Against the Shadow
description:
Play only if each hero y ou control has the printed [Spirit] resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase. [Spirit] characters use their [Willpower] instead of [Defense].

name: Harbor Master
description: Response: After a card effect adds any number of resources to the resource pool of a hero you control. Harbor Master gains +1 [Defense] until the end of the round.

name: Advance Warning
description:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed [Lore] resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase. enemies do not make engagement checks.

name: White Tower Watchman
description: If each hero you control belongs to the same sphere of influence. you may assign damage from undefended enemy attacks to the White Tower Watchman instead of a hero you control.

name: The Pursuit
description:
Side A: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Dru-buri-Dru and set him aside. out of play. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player and add it to the staging area.

name: An Untimely End
description: Side B: Archery damage must be assigned to allies. if able.

name: The Passage Out
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Add Dru-buri-Dru to the staging area.
Side B: Siege. (Characters use their [Defense] instead of [Willpower] when questing.)
Characters use their [Willpower] instead of [Attack] when attacking enemies. If an enemy would be damaged this way. place progress tokens on it instead of damage tokens. When an enemy has progress equal to its hit points. add it to the victory display and place those progress tokens on the quest.
If the players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Dru-Buri-Dru
description:
Allies cannot defend against Dru-buri-Dru.
While Dru-buri-Dru is in the victory display. characters get +1 [Willpower] and +1 [Defense].
Unless Dru-buri-Dru is in the victory display. the players cannot win.

name: Druadan Drummer
description:
Each Wose enemy in the staging area gets +2 [Threat] 
Shadow: Each Wose enemy engaged with the defending player gets +1 [Attack].

name: Drudadan Elite
description:
X is the number of players in the game.
Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks unless any player pays 1 resource.

name: Drudadan Hunter
description:
X is the number of heroes in play with no resources in their resource pool. 
Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 [Attack].

name: Drudadan Thief
description: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks unless any player pays 1 resource.

name: Ancestral Clearing
description:
The cost to play each player card is increased by 1.
Travel: Exhaust a hero to travel here.

name: Garden of Poisons
description:
Heroes cannot gain resources from card effects.
Travel: Each player must pay 1 resource to travel here.

name: Glade of Cleansing
description:
Each Wose enemy gains archery 1.
X is equal to the total archery value of the highest archery Wose enemy in play.

name: Men in the Dark
description: When Revealed: Each hero must pay 1 resource or take 1 damage. If no hero takes damage from this effect. Men in the Dark gains surge.

name: Stars in the Sky
description: When Revealed: Each questing hero must pay 1 resource or it is removed from the quest.

name: Leaves on Tree
description: When Revealed: Each player must pay 1 resource for each attachment he controls of discard all attachments he controls.

name: Pippin
description: If each hero you control has the Hobbit trait. Pippin gains: "Response: After an enemy engages you. raise your threat by 3 to return it to the staging area. Until the end of the round. that enemy cannot engage you."

name: Denethor
description:
Denethor gets -1 [Willpower] for each damaged hero you control.
Discard Denethor if his [Willpower] is 0 or less.

name: Lord of Morthond
description:
Attach to a Gondor or Outlands hero.
If each hero you control has a printed [Leadership] resource icon. Lord of Morthond gains "Response: After you play a [Lore]. [Spirit]. or [Tactics] ally. draw one card."

name: Book of Eldacar
description:
Attach to a [Tactics] hero.
Reduce the cost to play Book of Eldacar by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Tactics] resource icon.
Action: Discard Book of Eldacar to play any [Tactics] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Gondorian Discipline
description: Response: Cancel up to 2 points of damage just dealt to a Gondor character.

name: Minas Tirith Lampwright
description: Response: After and encounter card with surge is revealed. discard Minas Tirith Lampwright to name enemy. location. or treachery. If the next encounter card revealed is the named type. discard it without resolving its effects.

name: Small Target
description: Response: After a Hobbit hero you control exhausts to defend an attack. choose another enemy engaged with you and reveal the attacking enemys shadow card. If that shadow card has no shadow effect. resolve this enemys attack against the chosen enemy. If that shadow card has a shadow effect. resolve this attack as normal.

name: Ithilien Archer
description: Response: After Ithilien Archer attacks and damages an enemy. return that enemy to the staging area.

name: Ithilien Pit
description:
Play Ithilien Pit into the staging area unattached.
If unattached. attach Ithilien Pit to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
Any character may choose attached enemy as the target of an attack.

name: Hobbit-sense
description:
Play only if each of your heroes is a Hobbit.
Combat Action: Enemies engaged with you do not attack this phase. You cannot declare attacks this phase.

name: Savagery of the Orcs
description:
Side A: Setup: Set Ghulat aside. out of play. Put Lord Alcaron into play. Make Burning Farmhouse the active location. Add the Rescued Villagers and Dead Villagers objectives to the staging area. Then. shuffle the encounter deck and reveal 1 encounter card per player and add it to the staging area.
Side B: Villagers 5.
When progress would be placed on Savagery of the Orcs. move an equal number of villager tokens from this quest onto Rescued Villagers instead.
If there are no villager tokens on Savagery of the Orcs. advance to the next stage.

name: Protect the Villagers
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Add Ghulat to the staging area.
Side B: If an attack goes undefended. discard X villager tokens from Rescued Villagers instead of damaging a hero. X is the amount of damage that would have been dealt.
When the players defeat this stage. end the game. Compare the number of tokens on Rescued Villagers to the number of tokens on Dead Villagers.

name: Rescued Villagers
description:
If a location leaves play as an explored location. move any villager tokens from that location to Rescued Villagers.
At the end of the game. if there are more villager tokens here than damage tokens on Dead Villagers. the players have won.

name: Dead Villagers
description:
If a villager token is discarded from a location. objective. or quest stage. place a damage token on Dead Villagers.
At the end of the game. if there are more damage tokens here than villager tokens on Rescued Villagers. the players have lost.

name: Lord Alcaron
description:
The first player gains control of Lord Alcaron.
Response: After a villager token is discarded. exhaust Lord Alcaron to place that villager token on a location instead.
If Lord Alcaron leaves play. the players have lost the game.

name: Ghulat
description:
X is the number of damage tokens on Dead Villagers.
Forced: When Ghulat attacks. place 1 damage token on Dead Villagers.
When Ghulat is in play. the game cannot end.

name: Marauding Orc
description: Forced: After Marauding Orc attacks and destroys a character. place 1 damage token on Dead Villagers.

name: Orc Ravager
description: When Revealed: Discard 1 villager token from the active location. If no villager token is discarded by this effect. Orc Ravager gains surge.

name: Craven Eagle
description: When Revealed: Discard the character with the fewest remaining hit points. That characters controller may discard 3 cards at random from his hand to prevent this effect.

name: Burning Farmhouse
description: Foced: At the end of the round. discard 1 villager token from Burning Farmhouse.

name: Gondorian Hamlet
description: While Gondorian Hamlet is in the staging area it gains: "Forced: After a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck. discard 1 villager token from Gondorian Hamlet."

name: Secluded Farmhouse
description: Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.

name: Burnt Homestead
description: When Revealed: Raise each players threat by the number of damage tokens on Dead Villagers.

name: Trapped Inside
description: When Revealed: Discard 1 villager token from the active location for each player in the game. If no villager tokens were removed by this effect. Trapped Inside gains surge.

name: Panicked!
description: When Revealed: Each player must take a villager token from Rescued VIllagers and place it on a location in the staging area. if able. If no villager tokens were placed on a location by this effect. Panicked! gains surge.

name: Faramir
description: Faramir gets +1 [Attack] for each enemy in the staging area.

name: Sword of Morthrond
description:
Attach to a Gondor ally.
Attached ally gains the Outlands trait.

name: Men of the West
description: Action: Return X Outlands allies from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Knight of Minas Tirith
description: If each of your heroes has a printed [Tactics] resource icon. Knight of Minas Tirith gains: "Response: After Knight of Minas Tirith enters play. choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage that enemy and exhaust Knight of Minas Tirith to declare it as attacker (and resolve its attack) against that enemy."

name: Gondorian Fire
description:
Attach to a Gondor or Dunedain hero.
Action: Spend 1 resource from attached heros resource pool to give attached hero +1 [Attack] for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Pelargir Shipwright
description: Pelargir Shipwright gets +1 [Willpower] for each hero you control with a printed [Spirit] resource icon.

name: Map of Earnil
description:
Attach to a [Spirit] Hero.
Reduce the cost to play Map of Earnil by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Spirit] resource icon.
Action: Discard Map of Earnil to play any [Spirit] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then. place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Ranger Bow
description:
Attach to a Ranger character. Restricted.
Action: Exhaust Ranger Bow and attached character to deal 1 damage to an enemy in the staging area.

name: Forest Patrol
description:
Play only if you control at least 1 Ranger character.
Action: Deal 3 damage to an enemy with at least 1 Trap card attached to it.

name: Palantir
description:
Attach to a Noble hero.
Planning Action: Exhaust Palantir and attached hero to name a card type and look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that matches the named type. draw a card. For each of those cards that does not match the named type. raise your threat by 2.

name: Retake the City
description:
Side A: Each player chooses 1 enemy and 1 unique location and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Player card effects cannot place progress tokens on locations in the staging area.
Forced: When an Osgiliath location leaves play as an explored location. the first player takes control of that location.
If the players controll all Osgiliath locations in play at the end of the round. they have won the game.

name: Uruk Lieutenant
description: When Revealed: Add the topmost Orc enemy from the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

name: Uruk Soldier
description: Forced: After Uruk Soldier attacks and destroys a character. that characters controller returns a location he controls to the staging area. if able.

name: Southron Phalanx
description: While engaged with a player. Sourthron Phalanx gets +1 [Attack] for each location that player controls.

name: Sourthron Commander
description: When Revealed: Southron Commander makes an immediate attack from the staging area against each player who controls at least 1 location.

name: West Gate
description:
Action: If there is no active location. search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Osgiliath location. reveal it and add it to the staging area. Then. make West Gate the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Forced: After the player who controls West Gate lets an attack go undefended. return West Gate to the staging area.

name: The Kings Library
description:
Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.
Forced: After the player who controls The Kings Library lets an attack go undefended. return The Kings Library to the staging area.

name: Ancient Harbor
description:
The players cannot travel here.
Combat Action: Exhaust a hero to place 1 progress token on Ancient Harbor.
Forced: After the player who controls Ancient Harbor lets an attack go undefended. return Ancient Harbor to the staging area.

name: The Old Bridge
description:
The players cannot travel here.
Planning Action: Spend 2 resources to place 1 progress token on The Old Bridge. (1 resource instead if there is another Osgiliath location in the staging area.)
Forced: After the player who controls The Old Bridge lets and attack go undefended. return The Old Bridge to the staging area.

name: West Quarter
description: While West Quarter is the active location. the current quest gains siege. (Characters quest using [Defense] instead of [Will].)

name: East Quarter
description: While East Quarter is the active location. the current quest gains battle. (Characters quest using [Attack] instead of [Will].)

name: Ruined Square
description:
Response: After an enemy is defeated. place 1 progress token on Ruined Square.
Forced: If a player controsl Ruined Square when a character leaves play. return Ruined Square to the staging area.

name: Ruined Tower
description:
Travel: If there is 1 active location. exhaust a hero to travel here. (there are now 2 active locations.)
Forced: After the player who controls Ruined Tower loses control of a location. return Ruined Tower to the staging area.

name: Pinned Down
description: When Revealed: Add X to the archery total this round. X is the number of locations the players control. If the players control less than 4 locations. Pinned Down gains surge.

name: Street Fighting
description: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an Osgiliath location is discarded. The first player may exhaust a hero to take control of that location. Otherwise. add that location to the staging area. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Counter-Attack
description: When Revealed: Each player must return the location he controls with the highest [Threat] to the staging area. or raise his threat by the total [Threat] of all locations he controls.

name: Caldara
description: Action: Discard Caldara to put 1 [Spirit] ally from your discard pile into play for each other hero you control with a printed [Spirit] resource icon.

name: Squire of the Citadel
description: Response: After Squire of the Citadel leaves play. add 1 resource to a Gondor heros resource pool.

name: Tome of Atanatar
description:
Attach to a [Leadership] hero. 
Reduce the cost to play Tome of Atanator by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Leadership] resource icon.
Action: Discard Tome of Atanator to play any [Leadership] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then. place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Guthlaf
description:
If there is at least 1 Rohan hero in play. lower the cost to play Guthlaf by 1.
If there is at least 1 Gondor hero in play. Guthlaf gains sentinel.

name: The Hammer-stroke
description: Encounter Action: Engage each enemy in play.

name: Emery
description: Action: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck to put Emery into play from your hand. under any players control. Then. if any of the discarded cards have the [Tactics]. [Lore]. or [Leadership] sphere. discard Emery.

name: Children of the Sea
description: Action: Choose a Silvan or Noldor ally you control. That ally gets +2 [Willpower] until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase. shuffle that ally into its owner’s deck if it is still in play.

name: Anborn
description: Action: Exhaust Anborn to return 1 Trap card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Poisoned Stakes
description:
Play Poisoned Stakes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached. attach Poisoned Stakes to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
At the end of each round. deal 2 damage to attached enemy.

name: Well-Equipped
description: Action: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. You may attach 1 attachment card discarded by this effect to an eligible Dwarf character in play.

name: The Ambush
description:
Setup: Add The Crossroads and Black Numenorean to the staging area. Put the Faramir and Lord Alcaron objective allies into play. Shuffle the encounter deck and reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player and add it to the staging area.

At the beginning of the quest phase. each player takes 1 hidden card. At the beginning of the combat phase. each player must turn each of his hidden cards faceup or take 1 hidden card.

name: Captured!
description:
When Revealed: Place Faramir and Lord Alcaron under Captured! (they are in play but the players cannot gain control of them). Each player turns each of his hidden cards faceup.

Battle. (Characters use their [Attack] instead of [Willpower] when questing.)
At the beginning of the quest phase. each player takes 1 hidden card.
If a player has 5 hidden cards. he must turn them faceup.
If the players defeat this stage. they have won the game.

name: Black Numenorean
description:
X is the total number of hidden cards in the game.
Forced: At the end of the round. each player must raise his threat by 1 for each hidden card in his play area.
Victory 3.

name: Orc Ambusher
description: Forced: After Orc Ambusher engages you. discard 1 non-objective ally you control. if able.

name: Brutal Uruk
description: Forced: After Brutal Uruk attacks and destroys a character. that characters controller turns all hidden cards in his play area faceup. Deal a shadow card to each enemy turned faceup by this effect and resolve their attacks as normal.

name: Evil Crow
description: Forced: When Evil Crow engages a player. that player takes 1 hidden card.

name: The Cross-roads
description:
The current quest card gains siege.
X is equal to the number of players in the game.
Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

name: Southern Road
description: Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

name: Western Road
description:
Western Road gets +5 quest points while it is in the staging area.
Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

name: Northern Road
description: Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

name: Eastern Road
description:
Eastern Road gets +5 quest points while it is in the staging area.
Travel: The first player must take 2 hidden cards to travel here.

name: The Dark Woods
description:
Archery X. 
X is the number of players in the game.
Forced: After The Dark Woods leaves play as an explored location. the first player discards 1 hidden card.

name: Lying in Wait
description: When Revealed: The first player turns each hidden card in his play area faceup. Resolve the "When Revealed" effects of each encounter card turned faceup by this effect. If a location is turned faceup. add it to the staging area.

name: Mordor Looms
description: When Revealed: Each player takes 1 hidden card.

name: Conflict at the Crossroads
description: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase. Orc enemies engaged with players add their [Threat] to the staging area. If no Orc enemies are engaged with players. Conflict at the Crossroads gains surge.

name: Faramir
description:
The first player gains control of Faramir.
Combat Action: Exhaust Faramir to turn a hidden card faceup. If that card is an enemy. deal 3 damage to it.
If Faramir leaves play. the players have lost the game.

name: Lord Alcaron
description:
The first player gains control of Lord Alcaron.
Action: Exhaust Lord Alcaron to return an enemy engaged with you to the staging area.
If Lord Alcaron leaves play. the players have lost the game.

name: ThEoden
description: Each Hero with a printed [Tactics] resource icon gets +1 [Willpower]

name: Pelargir Ship Captain
description: Response: After Pelargir Ship Captain enters play. move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another heros resource pool.

name: Visionary Leadership
description:
Attach to a Gondor hero.
While attached hero has at least 1 resource in its resource pool. Gondor characters get +1 [Willpower].

name: Spear of the Mark
description:
Attach to a Rohan character. Restricted.
Attached character gets +1 [Attack]. (+2 [Attack] instead if attacking an enemy in the staging area).

name: Forth Eorlingas!
description: Combat Action: Each Rohan hero can be declared as an attacker against enemies in the staging area this phase.

name: Steed of the Mark
description:
Attach to a Gondor or Rohan hero.
Response: After attached hero commits to a quest. spend 1 resource from attached heros resource pool to ready attached hero.

name: Lay of Nimrodel
description: Action: Choose a [Spirit] hero. Until the end of the phase. that hero gets +1 [Willpower] for each resource in its resource pool.

name: Ered Nimrais Prospector
description: Response: After Ered Nimrais Prospector enters play. discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then. choose and shuffle 1 card from your discard pile back into your deck.

name: Scroll of Isildur
description:
Attach to a [Lore] hero.
Reduce the cost to play Scroll of Isildur by 1 for each hero you control with a printed [Lore] resource icon.
Action: Discard Scroll of Isildur to play any [Lore] event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then. place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Hidden Cache
description:
Response: After Hidden Cache is discarded from your deck. add 2 resources to the resource pool of a hero you control.
Action: Spend 1 resource to draw 1 card.

name: The Rearguard
description:
Side A: Setup: Set aside Lord Alcaron. Nazgul of Minas Morgul. and The White Bridge. Add To the Tower. Murzag. and 1 copy of Morgul Vale to the staging area.
Side B: Murzag cannot leave play unless destroyed. If Murzag is defeated. advance to the next stage.

name: The Betrayal
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Add Lord Alcaron to the staging area.
Side B: Lord Alcaron cannot leave play unless destroyed. If Lord Alcaron is defeated. advance to the next stage.

name: The Morgul Rider
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Add Nazgul of Minas Morgul and The White Bridge to the staging area.
Side B: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.
Nazgul of Minas Morgul cannot leave play unless destroyed.
If Nazgul of Minas Morgul is defeated. the players have won the game.

name: To the Tower
description:
To the Tower cannot leave the staging area.
Remove Faramir from the game.
If 10 or more progress tokens are on To the Tower. the players have lost the game.

name: Morgul Bodyguard
description: Any damage that would be dealt to a Captain enemy is dealt to 1 Morgul Bodyguard instead.

name: Morgul Sorcerer
description: Forced: After any number of progress tokens are placed on To the Tower. deal Morgul Sorcerer a shadow card.

name: Morgul Tracker
description: Forced: When Morgul Tracker is optionally engaged. place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

name: Murzag
description: After Murzag attacks. reveal the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy. put it into play engaged with the defending player.

name: Lord Alcaron
description:
Forced: When Lord Alcaron attacks. place 1 progress token on To the Tower.
Forced: When Lord Alcaron is dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect. he makes an additional attack after this one (deal and resolve another shadow card).

name: Nazgul of Minas Morgul
description:
Nazgul of Minas Morgul cannot have attachments.
Reduce any amount of damage dealt to Nazgul of Minas Morgul to 1.

name: Morgul Road
description: Response: After Morgul Road leaves play as an explored location. the first player may remove 1 progress token from To the Tower or deal 1 damage to an enemy in play.

name: Morgul Vale
description: Forced: At the end of the round. each player returns 1 enemy engaged with him to the staging area.

name: The White Bridge
description: X is the number of progress tokens on To the Tower.

name: Impenetrable Fog
description: When Revealed: The first player places 3 progress tokens on To the Tower or reveals X additional cards from the encounter deck and adds them to the staging area. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Sleepless Malice
description: When Revealed: Each player must discard 3 random cards from his hand or place 1 progress token on To The Tower.

name: Terror Drives Them
description: When Revealed: Place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

name: The Dead City Looms
description: When Revealed: Raise each players threat by the number of progress tokens on To the Tower. If there are no progress tokens on To the Tower. The Dead City Looms gains surge.

name: Eomer
description: Response: After a character leaves play. Eomer gets +2 [Attack] until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

name: Grima
description: Action: Lower the cost of the next card you play from your hand this round by 1. That card gains Doomed 1. (Limit once per round.)

name: Saruman
description:
At the end of the round. discard Saruman from play.
Response: After Saruman enters play. choose a non-unique enemy or location in the staging area. While Saruman is in play. the chosen enemy or location is considered to be out of play.

name: Orthanc Guard
description: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword. read Orthanc Guard.

name: Isengard Messenger
description: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword. Isengard Messenger gets +1 [Willpower] until the end of the round. (Limit twice per round.)

name: Westfold Outrider
description: Action: Discard Westfold Outrider to choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage the chosen enemy.

name: Westfold Horse-breeder
description: Response: After Westfold Horse-breeder enters play. search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mount attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Rohan Warhorse
description:
Attach to a [Tactics] or Rohan hero. Restricted.
Response: After attached hero participates in an attack that destroys an enemy. exhaust Rohan Warhorse to read attached hero.

name: Silver Lamp
description:
Attach to a [Spirit] hero.
While attached hero is ready. shadow cards dealt to enemies engaged with you are dealt face up. (Shadow card effects are still resolved when resolving enemy attacks.)

name: Keys of Orthanc
description:
Attach to a hero.
Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword. exhaust Keys of Orthanc to add 1 resource to attached hero’s resource pool.

name: Legacy of Numenor
description: Action: Add 1 resource to each heros resource pool.

name: Deep Knowledge
description: Action: Each player draws 2 cards.

name: The Wizards Voice
description: Action: Each player chooses 1 enemy engaged with him. Until the end of the phase. each chosen enemy cannot attack the player that chose it.

name: Power of Orthanc
description: Action: Each player may choose and discard a Condition attachment from play.

name: The Seeing-stone
description:
Action: Search your deck for a card with the Doomed keyword and add it to your hand. 
Shuffle your deck.

name: Gríma
description:
If free of encounters. the first player gains control of Gríma.
Action: Exhaust Gríma to draw a card.
If Gríma leaves play. the players lose the game.

name: The Islet
description:
Immune to player card effects.
While The Islet is the active location. each Dunland enemy in play gets +1 [Threat].

name: Fords of Isen
description:
While Fords of Isen is in the staging area. players cannot gain resources from card effects.
Forced: After Fords of Isen becomes the active location. each player with fewer than 5 cards in his hand draws cards until he has 5 in his hand.

name: The Kings Road
description:
While any player has 3 or more cards in hand. The Kings Road gets +3 quest points.
While any player has 5 or more cards in hand. The Kings Road gains: "When faced with the option to travel. the players must travel to The Kings Road. if able."

name: Gap of Rohan
description:
While Gap of Rohan is in the staging area. Dunland enemies get +1 [Attack]. 
Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [Attack]. If this attack destroys a character. remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

name: Pillaging and Buring
description: When Revealed: Each player draws a card. Each player raises his threat by 1 for each card in his hand.

name: Down from the Hills
description: When Revealed: Each player must choose: Either remove 1 time counter from the current quest. or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dunland enemy. reveal it. and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. If any player has 5 or more cards in hand. this effect cannot be canceled.

name: Ill Tidings
description: When Revealed: The first player draws this card into his hand. Ill Tidings cannot leave that players hand. Then. if the first player has 5 or more cards in his hand. Ill Tidings gains surge.

name: Mugash
description:
Cannot have attachments.
Forced: After Mugash is defeated. the first player attaches him to a hero he controls and exhausts that hero. (Counts as a Captive attachment with the text: "Attached hero cannot ready. If attached hero leaves play. the players lose the game.")

name: Mugashs Guard
description:
While a player controls a hero with Mugash attached. Mugashs Guard engages that player.
Forced: After Mugashs Guard destroys a character. if Mugash is attached to a hero. return Mugash to the staging area.

name: Methedras Orc
description: Forced: When Methedras Orc attacks. the defending player shuffles 1 random card from his hand into his out-of-play deck.

name: Methedras
description:
While Methedras is the active location. each location in the staging area gets +1 [Threat].
Forced: When Methedras leaves play as an explored location. each player Searches 3.

name: Orc Cave
description:
Forced: After Orc Cave leaves play as an explored location. the first player Searches 5.
Travel: Discard the top X cards of the encounter deck to travel here. X is the number of players in the game. Add each Orc enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

name: Mugashs Lair
description: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase. reveal the top card of each players out-of-play deck. Add each revealed enemy to the staging area and discard the rest.

name: Orc Territory
description: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a location and adds it to the staging area. If the total [Threat] in the staging area is less than the total [Willpower] of all characters committed to the quest. each Orc enemy engaged with a player makes an immediate attack.

name: Mugash
description:
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. Attach Mugash to that hero.
Forced: After attached hero takes damage. return Mugash to the top of the encounter deck.

name: Edge of Fangorn
description:
Immune to player card effects.
Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Huorn enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here (2 Huorn enemies instead if there are 3 or more players in the game).

name: Dark-Hearted Huorn
description:
Hinder. Cannot have attachments.
Forced: At the beginning of each resource phase. the engaged player must raise his threat by 2.

name: Angry Huorn
description:
Hinder. Cannot have attachments.
Forced: At the beginning of each resource phase. Angry Huorn attacks the engaged player.

name: Deady Huorn
description:
Hinder. Cannot have attachments.
Forced: At the beginning of each resource phase. the engaged player must deal 3 damage to a character he controls.

name: Heart of Fangorn
description: While Heart of Fangorn is in the staging area. each player cannot refresh more than 5 characters during the refresh phase.

name: The Forests Malice
description: When Revealed: Each Huorn enemy engaged with a player makes an immediate attack. If no attack was made as a result of this effect. each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Huorn enemy and put it into play engaged with him. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Orc Skirmisher
description: Forced: After Orc Skirmisher engages a player. that player must either deal 3 damage to a character he controls. or remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

name: Orc Hunter
description: When Revealed: Either reveal an additional encounter card. or remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

name: Orc Hound
description: Forced: After Orc Hound engages a player. that player must exhaust a character he controls.

name: Orc Hunting Party
description: When Revealed: Deal each Orc enemy in play a shadow card. Each Orc enemy gets -15 engagement cost until the end of the round. If there are no Orc enemies in the staging area. Orc Hunting Party gains surge.

name: Dunland Prowler
description: While any player has 3 or more cards in hand. Dunland Prowler gains surge. While any player has 5 or more cards in hand. Dunland Powler gets +1 Threat.

name: Dunlending Bandit
description: While engaged with a player. Dunlending Bandit gets +1 [Attack] for each card in that players hand.

name: Dunland Raider
description: Forced: After Dunland Raider engages a player. that player must deal X damage divided among characters he controls where X equals the number of cards in his hand.

name: Old Hatreds
description:
When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. 
(Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After a player draws any number of cards. raise his threat by 1.")

name: Dunland Tribesman
description:
When Revealed: Each player draws a card. 

Forced: After a player draws any number of cards. Dunland Tribesman gets +1 [Threat] until the end of the round.

name: Dunland Chieftain
description: Forced: After Dunland Chieftain engages a player. discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck. where X is the number of cards in the engagede players hand. Put the topmost Dunland enemy discarded this way into play engaged with the player.

name: Dunland Berserker
description: Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards. Dunland Berserker makes an immediate attack.

name: Wild Men of Dunland
description: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After a player draws any number of cards. that player deals 1 damage to a character he controls.")

name: Ancient Forest
description: While Ancient Forest is in the staging area. each Forest location in the staging area gets +1 [Threat] and +3 quest points. This ability does not stack with other copies of Ancient Forest.

name: Tangled Woods
description: While Tangled Woods is in the staging area. each Forest location in plays gains: "Travel: Exhaust a hero to travel here." This ability does not stack with other copies of Tangled Woods.

name: Turned Around
description: When Revealed: Either remove 1 time counter from a card in play. or return the active location to the staging area.

name: Prowling Wolf
description: While engaged with a player. Prowling Wolf gets +1 [Attack] for each location in the staging area.

name: Broken Lands
description: While Broken Lands is in the staging area. progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

name: Take Cover!
description: When Revealed: Either deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. or remove 1 time counter from the current quest

name: Low on Provisions
description: When Revealed: Each player must assign X damage among characters he controls. where X is the number of characters he controls.

name: Off Track
description: When Revealed: Attach to a location in play. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per location. Attached location gets +2 quest points and Gain: Forced: Remove an additional time counter from the current quest at the end of each refresh phase. if able.")

name: In Need of Rest
description: When Revealed: Remove a hero from the quest and attach In Need of Rest to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Forced: After a time counter is removed from the current quest. attached hero takes 1 damage.")

name: Fight at the Fords
description:
Side A: Setup: Add The Islet to the staging area and attach Gríma to that location. Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. 

Side B: Time 5. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. discard Gríma from play. 

The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Gríma.

name: Dunlending Attack
description:
Side B: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. 

Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. each player assigns X damage among characters he controls where X is the number of cards in his hand. Place 2 time counters on this stage.

name: Hold the Fords
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. 

Side B: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. discard the top X cards from the encounter deck. X is the number of cards in the first players hand. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area. Put 3 time counters on this stage.

While there is at least 1 enemy in play. the players cannot defeat this stage. If the players defeat this stage. they win the game.

name: Orders from Orthanc
description:
Side A:Setup: Each player removes the top 20 cards of his deck and places them aside. as an out-of-play deck. The first player takes Mugash plus 1 Mugashs Guard for each other player in the game and randomly shuffles one facedown into each players out-of-play deck. Place any remaining copies of Mugashs Guard aside. out of play. 

Side B: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck for a Mountain location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then. advance to stage 2.

name: Searching for Mugash
description:
Side B: Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed for this stage. shuffle the discard pile into the encounter deck and reveal 2 encounter cards per player. Place 2 time counters on this stage. 

Response: After questing successfully. cancel all progress that would be placed on this stage. Then. place 1 time counter on this stage. Or. if Mugash is in play. advance to stage 3.

name: The Wizards Prize
description:
Side B: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. return Mugash to the staging area and reveal X encounter cards. X is the number of players in the game minus 1. Place 3 time counters on this stage. 

Progress cannot be placed on this stage unless Mugash is attached to a hero. 

If the players defeat this stage. they win the game.

name: Into the Woods
description:
Side A: Setup: Add Edge of Fangorn to the staging area and attach Mugash to that location. Shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal X additional encounter cards where X equals the number of players in the game minus 1.

Side B: Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. shuffle Mugash into the encounter deck and advance to stage 3. 

The players cannot advance to stage 2 unless Mugash is attached to a hero.

name: Escape from Fangorn
description:
Side A: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Huorn enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. 

Side B: Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. shuffle Mugash into the encounter deck and advance to stage 3A. 

The players cannot defeat this stage unless Mugash is attached to a hero. 

If the players defeat this stage. they win the game.

name: The Angry Forest
description:
Side B: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage. discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Each player must choose an enemy or objective in the discard pile. reveal it and add it to the staging area. Place 3 time counters on this stage. 

Forced: After placing progress here. if there is at least 6 progress on this stage and Mugash is attached to a hero. advance to stage 2A.

name: The Witch-king
description:
Players cannot play attachments on The Witch-king.
While The Witchin-king is in the staging area. each character gets -1 Willpower.
Forced: After The Witch-king attacks. he returns to the staging area unless the defending player raises his threat by 3.
